Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Concierge was extremely helpful and full of positive energy Tony and his colleague helped collect a box so I could FedEx items back to the U S all I had to do was pack and provide my account number and address THANK YOU They were also extremely knowledgeable of the city and surrounding areas Provided excellent The concierge provided excellent transportation directions to various areas Again THANKS Front desk was aware of my arrival from the another country and had a room available for me to check in upon my arrival from Manchester The gal at the front desk was very hospitable beautiful smile and suggested a great place for a traditional English breakfast All the staff I met are keepers

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The worst experience was at the sky bar lounger where it felt that I am being paid to have a drink The attitude of the bar tender was not at all acceptable I had expressed checked out and have not received my invoice yet Its been 5 days already No Pool
Positive_Review: The breakfast spread was amazing Metro access to walking distance The sky lounge is a one time must go place View

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The picture of the rooms are deceiving and our room was disappointingly smaller than I expected the queen bed was very small for 2 Our room looked out on Pepys street and not hotels fault but noise from building work opposite We came back from breakfast the next morning to pack to move rooms as not one available on arrival to find the maid tidying the room and making our bed for us She was very lovely but we couldn t get her to understand we didn t need it and wouldn t leave We were moved to King room facing inside bed much better intrusive view from other rooms No coat hooks not many hangers 4 night stay or drawers the mirror over the desk is too high TV on apple mac has no programme guide The air conditioning panel has a cover but it doesn t cover it side view so when in bed shone in my eyes Key card needed to use lift is temperamental Sky bar gets very busy with external visitors and struggled to get seated to eat Service charge is still added to drinks bill if you buy for the bar The carpet in the corridor on level 5 is rucked up in places and come away from the join causing me to trip
Positive_Review: The staff are always willing to help and very nice Daniel on front desk was very helpful and moved rooms for us Breakfast very good roof bar has an amazing views great cocktails

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price of drink in the hotel lobby 13 for a glass of wine and 5 50 for a small Heiniken extremely expensive whne you consider that in Witherspoons the same would cost half of that The breakfast while grand could have a bit more variety for teh price The English breakfast got a bit boring on the third day A bit of white and black Irish pudding would be good a few kippers possibly
Positive_Review: Location ideal for access to Underground

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing Everything was quite good
Positive_Review: Very nice excellent hotel Very courteous and friendly staff well designed nice restaurant inside hotel with a great choice of organic and natural products a natural and relaxed atmosphere sunlight everywhere spacious rooms great lobby and excellent breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No bath in the room
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly nice touch having a cookie on arrival Room was compact but adequate for our stay Roof top bar was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: the view from our room looked straight out on to a brick bridge not very pretty I m sure some people got good views but we were obviously just unlucky
Positive_Review: Bar on the 12th floor was great lovely views etc Warm cookie on arrival was also very nice although we checked in separately at different times and only one of us got a cookie Room was clean and fine

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Drinks quite expensive
Positive_Review: The room was spacious clean and well equipped with a lovely shower nice toiletries and complimentary water The breakfast was superb fabulous omelettes on offer excellent variety of food and the staff were first class friendly efficient and welcoming On arrival the queue for checking in was quite long it was Friday but staff came around with complimentary orange juice nice touch Reception staff processed our 6 rooms relatively quickly The hotel is very handy for taxis never had to wait also the underground is only 100 metres away Great transport options

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Arrived early room not ready told it would be ready for 15 00 that was no problem Went back after 15 00 room not ready and it would be over an hour they then changed our room to a disabled one got to room half eaten chocolate left in the fridge Next day room not made not by 19 05 given 6 complementary drinks but we only wanted things right as we had paid for which was not cheep
Positive_Review: good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: On returning to the hotel late in the evening we wanted to have a drink to finish off the day The lobby bar was empty and being vacuumed so we headed to the SkyBar which we found very disappointing as whilst not crowded offered limited seating and music was so loud we could hear it from the lift As it was mainly couples in the bar the loud music seemed unnecessary We left without having a drink as did other people who were in the lift with us One other annoying feature was the lifts failed to recognise that you had inserted your key card and therefore on a couple of occasions didn t stop at out floor loads of people were complaining in the lift about this
Positive_Review: A warm welcome and a cookie on checking in was a nice touch The staff we came into contact with were polite and professional We would definitely revisit the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Poor coffee as usual and long wait to check in although this was down to extra security measures
Positive_Review: Well appointed rooms including Apple TV Modern bathrooms and large rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We booked this as it had been described as luxurious and because it was a special birthday We had wanted luxury so didn t mind paying more than our usual Premier Inn choice We were really disappointed in the low standard of the room and had to upgrade to a King We felt that the Premier Inn at Euston was better and felt really let down

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Loved the staff the decor and especially the sky lounge the room was lovely and clean everything we needed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable My sister was nt feeling very well so having a very comfy bed to rest in did her the world of good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were comfortable the maid who made my room was really friendly like every member of the staff The breakfast was complete with lots of things to choose

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It was my partner s very significant birthday and on booking I had requested a room with a view of the river if at all possible as I wanted everything to be perfect On the 6th July 2 days before arrival I received an email offering champagne chocolates rose petals etc at a cost to help celebrate I skimmed it and didn t think any more about it On arrival I was told no rooms with a view were available and I had been sent an email to that effect which I didn t think I had and even if I had how would I cancel and rebook another hotel in London so close to the travel date The receptionist spoke to someone on the phone and asked for executive access I presume to make up for the disappointment I think she was told no and instead gave us four drinks vouchers which we used We were given a small room with a view of an office building on the fourth floor or the option to wait five minutes till 3pm for a room on the 7th which she said also didn t have a view Today I have checked for an email saying no rooms with views were available and couldn t find it By chance I re read the email about champagne and chocolates received on 6th and buried in the middle is general information saying no rooms with views were available but I had missed it It would have been much better to have explained this at the time of booking so as to avoid great disappointment and no option to rebook anywhere else 2 days before arrival time at the height of summer in London For 269 I expected a little better treatment or advanced warning to mitigate disappointment on the day
Positive_Review: Comfortable beds pillows very clean bedding large towels quiet Nice plain carpet in hallways no swirls to make your eyes crossed Staff helpful fast and efficient especially at breakfast Wide choice at breakfast fresh and plentiful range very little wait even at peak time

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Really good sized rooms Excellent staff extremely helpful and attentive Even during the breakfast rush period the longest wait was less than 5 minutes to be seated and the food was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The shower tended to leak onto the floor because of the design of the shower which led us to using extra towels Wish the trash cans in the room were a little a larger
Positive_Review: The staff at the front desk and management were very nice The executive lounge staff were exceptional and they had a lot of nice food offerings during the day The bar and restaurants were nice and the location was primo

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Loved the location beautiful view of the London Bridge from the rooftop lounge Rooms were fantastic and the staff very friendly and helpful We booked the executive queen which gave us access to the executive lounge This included free breakfast happy hour and heavy snacks in the evening Saved us a bundle in meals for our family of four The concierge went above and beyond to help us wirh transportation to Heathrow Would definitely return

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: We forgot to pack toothpaste so we called reception and they sent us up a little complimentary tube The staff on reception were all very friendly and we got cookies on arrival which was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful when approached with an issue Quick to get everything sorted

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated in a side street seconds away from a tube station and the tower of london On arrival we were welcomed with a warm cookie which is a lovely touch after the stresses of travelling in london The room was clean and well equipped with modern styling A huge bonus for us was the sky lounge rooftop bar Outstanding views of the city with delicious cocktails and a good range of foods available The breakfast is buffet style with a huge range of foods on offer all exceptional quality and delicious initially on booking we did think the additional cost for breakfast was steep We would now urge you to pay the extra Range includes continental full english pancakes muffins and waffles

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The staff in the restaurant was rude we were aware we had to pay for breakfast and out of nowhere without us asking he approached my boyfriend and made us aware we had to pay We went to celebrate my boyfriends birthday and him making that comment was uncalled for One of the cleaners were also rude as I was trying to explain to her I just walked out of my room and left one bag in there and she accused it not being my room when she saw me walking out of it
Positive_Review: The room location and rooftop bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I was charged 25GBP extra per night as a deposit which i do not still why This was no mentioned anywhere in the conditions Really small rooms
Positive_Review: Quiet You can have a proper sleep

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Despite taking an Club room the room size was still very small and certainly had no view at all Faced another office building
Positive_Review: I like the location of the hotel the restaurants at the hotel and the bar at the top

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I am very disappointed that no one saw fit to inform me that I would need to pay a Congestion Charge for having driven to the hotel especially as the concierge arranged my parking and knew I had not visited London before This has turned into a very costly mistake for me
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room had all the facilities you would want from a hotel I especially liked the computer tv great sound for listening to the radio channels Breakfast was great a very good choice of continental or full English My only problem was that we sat in the lobby which wasn t the problem but the cooked food wasn t hot and the plates were cold But we all enjoyed our breakfasts both mornings On our second morning we had a very nice young in training waiter called Daniel who was very attentive to our needs We have stayed in quite a few hotels in London over the years and I can honestly say this is one of the better ones by far

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: In my booking the breakfast was included when I arrive to have breakfast they told me it was not included then I have to pay for it I have to send the email confirmation to them they had to check and then they allow me I told them if the can give room service fue to the inconvenience they told me yes but I have to pay extra money for it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We had 2 rooms booked I asked for them to be together 6 months ago when we arrived they were apart and one room was not ready until nearly 7pm If I wanted one earlier they would have to be on totally separate floors What happend to 3pm check in We were not the only ones waiting I met a couple who walked the streets with their cases until their room was ready Also we booked this hotel for the sky bar only to find out under 18 s were not allowed in after 6pm So my daughters did not even see it After 9pm I could accept but 6pm We ve been all over the world in roof top bars and never come across this
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room was VERY small for being a King size room dated rugs were dirty bathroom immensely small using room key for elevator was cumbersome because cards wouldn t work had to have new cards made twice view was fishbowl of everyone else s room staff required us to use them for our luggage transport obviously wanted tips no restaurant on site staff hurried you along didn t get the feeling you were a customer more like cattle Apple TV was a pain couldn t scroll through to see what shows were on had to back out of a channel and try another prepaid room and was double charged at time of registration plus this property had a major identity crisis 1 Name on booking com DoubleTree Hilton another when they sent a reminder registration Best Western and a 3rd name when credit card charged name I never heard of it was like a bait and switch you pay for a Hilton property are given the expectation of a Best Western and wind up with something you never imagined overall would not stay here again
Positive_Review: Only thing I liked was the location because my husband wanted to go to the Tower Of London Don t misunderstand the view from the property was zero view of anything but other people s rooms Hello peeping Toms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were amazing Could not do enough for us and made us feel like royalty which we certainly aren t The only staff I found not so good was the barman in the sky lounge who made me feel a bit like we shouldn t be there That said though everyone else we encountered were wonderful and made this treat for us truly a wonderful experience Would definitely choose this hotel or a hotel in the same chain when visiting London again which I am next year with my daughter to come and see Hamilton

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We checked in early in the morning so we could leave our overnight bags for the day but on our return at the end of the day when tired we had to stand in a queue for half an hour with all those checking in for the first time who like us earlier were completing forms by hand what is that about in this computer age when bookings are made online Also it would have been nice if we were told how to make the lift work throughout our stay we came across people stuck going up and down in the lift because they couldn t make it stop at the floor they wanted
Positive_Review: Biggest plus was the air conditioning which worked very well Bed and pillows comfortable Breakfast enjoyable Nice touch was the cookie given on checking in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Coffee was terrible Room was small and in need of modernisation seemed cheap
Positive_Review: Easy location to many tubes and walkable to Thames and other places of interest Comparable price to airbnb in the area Good breakfast cafe not hotel breakfast room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast had plenty on offer but cooked options not very hot and just ok quality
Positive_Review: Brilliant room upgrade we were staying as part of a joint birthday celebration and this made our stay extra special Staff friendly and welcoming

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for sightseeing Tower of London Tower Bridge the Thames St Katherines dock the Gherkin and was 2 minutes from the Tower Hill tube station There are numerous restaurants around the area The Hotel staff were very pleasant and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It was the evening of the terror attacks and were unable to travel back to the hotel because all of central London was in lockdown we called the hotel to ask for assistance and was basically told to get on with it on our own eventually we got back some four hours after the concert had finished to be jumped on by two security staff asking what are you doing When explaining that we re staying here they asked for proof which we duly provided So much for pulling together this didn t happen in Manchester the week previous when terror struck there
Positive_Review: Welcome cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We enjoyed our stay but we were a bit disappointed when we found out everyone was given a cookie on check in which we didn t get given

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It is really strange that they blocked 75 per each night on my credit card and the amount is still blocked after more than 3 weeks
Positive_Review: The breakfast is really excellent The room was spacious well eqipped iron ironing board hair dryer Apple TV functioning as a computer as well keyboard mouse towels are extremely soft Quick checkout Kind staff at reception desk especially on arrival Close to underground station beautiful historical surrounding

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I stayed with sister who uses a wheelchair as she has limited mobility We had booked a standard room however when we arrived the check in staff offered us the option of an adapted room at no extra cost We didn t take them up on this offer only because it wasn t necessary the room we had booked was very spacious I was able to manage with the chair and the shower in the room was easily accessible for my sister During our stay we ate at the hotel restaurant as it was only a short distance we didn t take the wheelchair however a member of staff saw that my sister struggled walking and came over and advised that they had a wheelchair we could use if needed The friendliness of the staff and the assistance they provided from check in to check out was brilliant above and beyond any expectations They even took the time to show me the best routes to places on the tube etc that I would manage with the wheelchair

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It is part of a large hotel chain so if looking for something along the boutique hotel line there are better choices

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Hotel carpark was very difficult to get into and my husband curbed his alloy wheels on his very new car I tried to cancel my booking for 2 rooms 5 minutes after making it I was told that I would still have to pay as it was less than 24 hours before we were due to arrive So they would only charge for one room I said we would still honour the booking and go after all I was still charged for the cancellation although it was eventually sorted out They said as a good will gesture they wouldn t charge me for the cancellation When I hadn t cancelled after all this was more than a little annoying Especially after ruining the alloy wheels in the car park

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Cleanliness

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Asked the hotel to make an exception on reserving a parking space due to the value and required quick access to items in the vehicle to be given the standard response about first come first served then when we arrived they told us ah it s fine to just park your car here no problem shame we d already made alternative arrangements The bar staff seemed a little disinterested to say the least
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is great right next to tower bridge near enough right in the city Great place to explore from Not a lot of bars etc right next to it but that s not what I was there for on this trip Check in was quick and easy and the gentleman at reception was extremely polite and helpful Nice and clean and comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: cold buffet breakfast eggs beans all luke warm I also asked for de caf tea bags twice but none appeared and 2 wine glasses Staff member came up to the room with tea bags but not de caf and no wine glasses I went to reception after phoning twice and got my own tea bags and wine glasses I also expected more in the king suite we were in The bath was small and the room not as luxurious as portrayed on the web site disappointed and would not pay for a suite again as feel no better than a double room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: The bed was great breakfast very good only complaint it states that the room is soundproof yet we could hear the Girls in the next room talking kept us awake for quite a while also you could hear people walking past talking

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Internet is free for one day then costs By channels are minimal and the coffee and tea making facilities in the room are poor
Positive_Review: Great location good sized room and lovely bed Everything was clean and felt new and stylish

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Welcomed with a warm chocolate cookie the experience was top class I had a great time at this hotel and visited lots locally with lots of history surrounding this property it s in the prime location for exploring The staff at the hotel were willing to assist and always on hand I requested extra pillows and they were in my room in a flash I couldn t have been happier with this property and would rate it highly in all aspects when I checked out they were even then still more than happy to hold my luggage whilst I explored my last day in the city when I returned to collect my luggage there was no problem at all everybody was smiling and happy to assist

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t great thought there was room for improvement the serving tools was all mixed up and the bacon wasn t really fit for purpose

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Leaving the bags was quite a hectic process perhaps everything is a big close to main reception which makes it slightly confusing as people queuing for reception and leaving luggage When we checked in the second time and the room was ready we were greeted by a different receptionist who said that as my husband was 70 a room next to the lift had been allocated The implication was due to his age rather than it was an amazing room This was disappointing
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is ideal easy access to everywhere Breakfast was very busy but staff did a great job to run an efficient service Food was very good Room was comfortable I had a planned a big surprise party on the river and informed the hotel When we checked in and left our bags we were greeted by a very pleasant receptionist who was excited about my husband s birthday and implied that they were going to allocate the best room they could We went off rather excited about the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The check in is a 15 00 3 p m which is a very weird time and in most situation not convenient at all At least you can still leave your bags at the front desk
Positive_Review: We had a room on the 10th floor The room was clearly recently renovated so everything felt new It was very clean and I rarely say this There s what you need bed small desk a chair without all the unnecessary things like a bed cover that you don t what to do with The breakfast was quite nice The hotel is 2min from Tower Hill station so it s very convenient The classic welcome cookie is very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I did not like the lift system it was a very long wait for your lift to come to your Level

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room was very small for the price
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel to historical sites in London It is also two blocks from the underground which helps connect travelers to the rest of the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I asked for some extras to be out in the room as it was for my boyfriends birthday but when we went to the room nothing I had asked for was there I was very disappointed as I was assured it would be in the room
Positive_Review: Daniel on reception was fantastic We went for my boyfriends birthday and he made it extra special the shower was amazing And so was the pillows The fridge In the room was a nice touch too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lifts not enough for the amount of people using them The system of call has to be improved One morning we had to wait 15 minutes to get to the ground floor from the second floor
Positive_Review: Kindness of the staff Very confortable bed Good wi fi Skylounge view top Hall very cool

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The 4 lifts at peak times had large queues and stairs not next to the lifts Lift system not sensible at all Have to put card in slot in lift to access bedroom levels then press button Even then it didn t always take you to the level you needed we were on level 10 we ended up going back down again despite pressing the button lift was often full but stopped at every level going down And sometimes up Frustrating You can request not to have housekeeping and then you get a voucher for the bar Great idea but they still came in and changed the whole bed and did the housekeeping then knocked on the door for an unknown reason the day of departure rather early Strange Also changed the bar of soap each day Why What a waste Keep it there
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed and nice room The executive lounge facilities were fantastic strong coffee or tasty hot chocolate and food snacks Glad I chose this option and well worth it Was also be able to grab a take away coffee before heading out the door too Staff very friendly and helpful and welcome cookie the best I have tasted warm too Very clean hotel and good layout with lots of space to sit Would come back again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The fact that the breakfast was not in the price
Positive_Review: Didn t have breakfast cost in with the room Expensive to buy if you just want a light breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the hotel is in a great location to one of the major attractions in London and Tower Hill underground is only a 100 yards from the hotel the staff were excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The sky lounge and the city bar was nice Rooms was very well equipt All appliances in the room was a good quality as apposed what you usually get Onsite parking is a pro but not always guaranteed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The food in the restaurant probably one off On the whole satisfactory
Positive_Review: We liked the accommodation the breakfast was good Didn t like the food in the resturant the chicken dish was overcooked and my wife find it very hard to chew The manager offered another alternative dish free of charge My fish n chips was very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent full marks to their customer service training Loved the location just a few minutes walk from the Tower of London Great views from the Sky Bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lengthy check in due to receptionist taking phone calls while serving me Very loud air con Empty minibar
Positive_Review: Apple television with internet access was a very nice touch Very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Check in and out was very laboured with lengthy queues each time and members of Hilton Honours being taken out of queues and prioritised Perhaps they should have a separate check in desk to make them feel special and the majority of the other guests wanted Lifts were also poor and the use of cards for bedroom floors made matters worse With many stairwells between floors the extra security measure appears unnecessary One lift of four was out of action both days to make matters worse
Positive_Review: Great location within very short walk of underground stations Breakfast was excellent and rooms spacious and well equipped

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The hotel took 50 out of my account without informing me why It was apparently for admin fee that was refundable but I haven t received it
Positive_Review: The hotel took 50 out of my account without informing me why It was apparently for admin fee that was refundable but I haven t received it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very busy staff were slow If it s a bank holiday make sure more staff are working Check in queue was also long Not much variety for vegetarians
Positive_Review: Location was perfect Nice and comfortable bed Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent place in alone on opposite Tower Bridge The hotel was brilliant breakfast was really good but busy the staff cold not do enough for you and the position was fabulous for the tube as th Circle line was 100 metres away and took you everywhere 3 day a Oyster pass the way to go for the tube

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Friendly staff location very handy for Tower Hill Tube DLR Line plenty of places to eat drink near by Excellent London Marathon Hotel early breakfast route passes the Tower Of London Tower Bridge two minutes from Hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Horrendous bar prices
Positive_Review: Just excellent customer service all through great breakfast food quality very good front desk very helpful loved the warm cookies on arrival just a great experience We have stayed here once before some years ago enjoyed it then its still very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Didn t have connecting rooms ready so we had a long wait while they sorted it and then we ended up in a small room while the kids got a suite
Positive_Review: Helpful staff nice welcome with freshly baked cookies good breakfast selection well located

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Pillows were not good for me apparently you can ask for others but I didn t know that until check out
Positive_Review: Nice touches like having a computer in the room although this doubled as the TV and the screen was a little small good sized room and nice toiletries not the usual cheap tat Quiet at night Also the breakfast was excellent and we were given a cookie on arrival slightly random but nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Computer screen is a little small to use as a TV shower heat was temperamental Drinks at the SkyLounge bar are extraordinarily expensive
Positive_Review: V large and comfy bed friendly staff who offer quick and professional service No TV but an iMac in each room which has TV enabled as well as the limited use of the computer if you need it Air con was very effective 5 bar voucher if you refuse turn down service Free cookies at the reception desk SkyLounge bar is beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: air conditioning wasnt up to the task of cooling the big room iMac doesnt have an HDMI port so cant use streaming services
Positive_Review: free wifi nice bar on the 12th floor

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Rooms small and very long walk to lifts The sky bar was fabulous
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful especially when checking in Concierge was great wurst recently mmendations and directions

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Expensive parking rate
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff and clean atmosphere The Sky Lounge is a convenient place to have a relaxing evening in a stylish surrounding

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The rooms are too small and bathrooms are really tiny
Positive_Review: The sky lounge is wonderful Night View of Tower Bridge is amazing from sky lounge Staff is really friendly We spent most of our evening time at sky lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: They never mentioned how to use the lift with my key card so it took several goes to work it out The Mac Book instead of a TV doesn t really work it is very far away from the bed and the screen is small my speakers weren t working and when I tried to use it as a computer it said that the wireless keyboard and mouse weren t connected despite the keyboard and mouse not being wireless and being connected so I gave up and used my laptop but the wifi was very good
Positive_Review: The receptionist that checked me in was very welcoming and we ended up having quite a lengthy chat which was lovely The room was really nice The bed was very big with lots a fluffy pillows I slept like a baby I loved all the choice of teas how all the soaps etc are provided in the bathroom and the ironing board iron and shoe polish cloth came in very useful The bathroom was very clean and spacious but the toilet doesn t flush very well The breakfast had lots of choice the fresh fruit was really nice The hotel is 2 min walk from Tower Hill station and right by the Tower of London my meeting was in Westminster so the tube journey was about 15min They let me leave overnight bag in their cloakroom from 9am 6pm after I checked out which I was grateful for

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Only two faults for me in the bedrooms there didn t seem to be any extraction from the bathroom which meant smells pervaded everywhere The second was the breakfast the tea and the hot food was lukewarm at best and cold at worse
Positive_Review: The biscuits on arrival were great the staff were really friendly perfect location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I am allergic to lavender and they have lavender in all of their soaps etc so I had to use my face wash to wash my hands When I asked if they had any alternative the response was No That s it Not even a Sorry we ve left poison in every possible toilet
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Roof top bar would have preferred a more relaxing experience to enjoy the view not banging music
Positive_Review: Great location next to Tower of London quieter than other areas I ve stayed in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: the staff were extremely helpful we had an issue with the shower access and they immediately found us a new room that fit our needs will definitely use this hotel chain again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff very unhelpful found staff to be abrupt Concierge wasn t helpful at all 30 to park car then struggle with luggage no offer of assistance 4 rating is laughable never again
Positive_Review: Clean tidy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The rooms I would compare to a premier in other than the mac computer the beds was terrible there was no comfort in it what so ever me and my partner hardly slept and left by 8am the next morning we was going to stay up London for the day but had to go home as we had no sleep
Positive_Review: The sky lounge bar was a really good asset

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The scrambled eggs were soggy The seating was really tight for breakfast and the volume of people that come I think its understaffed during busy time Calling for guest service help before checking in was impossible to get ahold of them because they are so busy so some tours I was unable to do because I didnt know who to get information from due to hotel guest services to busy
Positive_Review: breakfast was good Staff was polite enjoyed the welcome cookie

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Views from the bedroom were pretty ordinary poor but that didn t matter to us
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful The location was superb just 3 minutes from the tube It s a great central London location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing All good
Positive_Review: The cookie on arrival was delicious The rooms were absolutely spotless I felt like I was the first person to ever use the shower So clean everywhere The location was perfect Staff were all so helpful friendly smiley

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: They couldn t cope with breakfast dining room was too small to accommodate the guests the waiting time was very long Any more than 2 guests and they had a meltdown
Positive_Review: Sky lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: air conditioning was quite noisy housekeeping banged on the door at 8 15 am There was a ong wait for the lifts every time I used them and lots of people coming and going past midnight visiting the Sky Lounge
Positive_Review: The location right by the Tower of London is ideal for business and leisure I was able to enjoy the view from Tower Bridge while walking to my meetings Very handy for tube and buses south bank restaurants etc Delighted to find an ironing board and iron in the room as well as a free bottle of water

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We supposedly had a deluxe queen room and it was nice but to be honest it was no bigger or any better than your average travel lodge withthe exception of a few handy toiletries
Positive_Review: As you walk in the lobby is very impressive and you immediately think you are going to have an amazing stay The staff are welcoming but at the end of the day for us it was the room that counted and it was disappointing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The only tiny criticism was that the music in the Skylounge was rather too loud for a venue where people were primarily conversing rather than dancing The fantastic view over the Tower of London and Tower Bridge meant that i didnt really mind the music though
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing the standard of service was very high nothing was too much trouble Breakfast was excellent as well

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room was very very poor for the price Cheap furnishings no TV A computer monitor that had limited channels I understand after staying there it was a business hotel but the quality of the room was 3 star at the very best very disappointed and as it was a holiday week we had no choices or I would have refused to accept the room Extremely disappointed I have stayed in Doubletree and Hilton this was not even Motel 6 room wise Everything else was acceptable restaurant for breakfast was okay
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Disappointed to pay 125 for a very late booking and to be given room designed for clients with mobility issues This would never be an issue if advised at time of booking but gave a feeling that filling a room was more important than client experience
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were clean staff all very helpful The hotel sky bar is excellent but pricey but what do you expect in London All rooms have an Apple Mac in them which is handy for making plans in the city and checking the maps for your trip

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: we had to ask for our room to be cleaned the next day It was done quite fast when asked however after a full day site seeing and coming back aprox 4pm I would have thought it should have been cleaned by this time lifts were a nightmare There was four lifts two broke during our weekend stay They were very unpredictable you would be waiting a while and then multiple time would go past you Many people trying to squeeze into a lift as they had been waiting so long Still really enjoyed our stay just a few things that could have been improved
Positive_Review: I liked how it was so close to the tube lots of places to eat and tower bridge Room on arrival was clean was given complimentary drinks as it was our wedding anniversary and had great views from the roof top bar Cookie on arrival was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: View from room adjacent building below scaffolding Price of drinks include service charge No toilet paper in bathroom crumbs of food on chair
Positive_Review: Great location Roof terrace with great views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Big issue was that we were given key cards to an occupied room We walked in and were shocked to find open bags and that definitely affected our stay What if someone walks into our room at any time Also the bed was small
Positive_Review: Excellent location good staff modern fit out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Indecent haste to clear our breakfast table when we had not finished our meal but had gone back to buffet for something more to eat This happened on each day We returned to the table and had to reorder beverages and cutlery We found this rather annoying as we could not relax because the breakfast was otherwise excellent We felt the pricing was rather steep for tourists with no company to pick up the expenses tab We would love to stay there more often but could not afford to do so
Positive_Review: Staff excellent and very attentive Reception welcoming and efficient Our room was just about perfect for our needs and very comfortable Location ideal for a tourist due to the proximity to the Tower of London The views from rooftop bar superb

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Long queue to check in no bath no staircase wait for lift all the time the view out of my window
Positive_Review: I liked the bar on the top floor I like my Mac in the room and its sound system

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Confusion with payment when leaving money was paid at time of checking in but staff were saying he would charge our card again when checking out You have to pay an extra 25 a night just incase you use room service this should be completely optional and they don t serve pints of beer in any of there bars just all bottles which is quiet annoying especially when you like a pint
Positive_Review: The skybar was excellent great views of London at night and by day location excellent just next to tube station and close to Towerhill plenty of bars and restaurants close by

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Only gripe is there were no rooms with city views Minor however
Positive_Review: Perfect location able to get anywhere in London in no time at all Rooms were comfortable and immaculately clean Skylounge was stunning

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We had a party of 20 booked in to the SkyLounge for lunch and it was really really disappointing The staff were lovely but totally overstretched The food was disappointing Caesar salad a romaine lettuce sliced in half and sprinkled with a hard boiled egg and some dried up chicken Long long wait for drinks which arrived in fits and starts We had booked in advance and therefore the size of the party was known before we arrived I do feel that if a restaurant can t cope with a large party size they should say so
Positive_Review: Rooms and room facilities were just what we expected although one of the rooms was an internal room and very hot Reception staff were lovely and very helpful Location and views are good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Everything was top notch
Positive_Review: Lovely staff Crisp white sheets on a comfy bed and everything we needed in the bathroom loved the Crabtree Evelyn toiletries Breakfast was very good lots of choice hot cooked food too and no soggy toast in sight Delicious croissants and pastries and an excellent bread selection too To top it all the view over London from the Sky lounge is fantastic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was spotlessly clean and the bed was super comfy The rooftop bar was amazing you got a great view of London The staff were very friendly and helpful Loved the warm cookie you got on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No complaints
Positive_Review: Spacious comfortable room with temperature controls Small refrigerator in room very welcome for storing drinks Easy access to tube and around the corner from Tower Bridge and Tower of London Amazing breakfast with loads of choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Would like a little more tea coffee etc in the room Having to use room key for the lift was a little irritating
Positive_Review: The welcome cookie was delicious The room was clean and comfortable Location was perfect for sightseeing trip The rooftop bar was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Waiting times at check in were too long We were asked to the counter but the receptionist ran away and asked us to wait Guests that were behind us in line were then served before us by other receptionist
Positive_Review: The warm chocolate cookies at check in were great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Sky bar was quite expensive however we happily drank in there most of the weekend
Positive_Review: Rooms were perfect for what we needed Sky bar is lovely and amazing views of the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lifts were a bit of a pain to operate and the volume on the i mac wasn t very loud in our room but other than that a brilliant hotel
Positive_Review: Brilliant friendly staff food excellent and a nice quiet hotel and comfortable rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 1 member of bar staff at skylounge arrogant and rude The guy that shakes the cocktails loved himself and let our experience down unfortunately
Positive_Review: Everybody was amazing made us feel so welcome Sky lounge bar views spectacular Food amazing worth every penny Location perfect

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Huge queues for breakfast Fortunately we got up early 7 30 hotel did warn in advance but did feel a little rushed as you could see the huge queues waiting On a Sunday there is the option of skipping breakfast and paying 10 to have brunch in the sky lounge which includes mimosas Which I think if I went again I would do instead
Positive_Review: Fantastic location clean friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No food or room service after 11pm No view hard to find even sat nav failed to get us there and we hopped into taxi
Positive_Review: Breakfast great Staff nice very efficient Rooms clean neat

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Pillows were rubbish Avoid breakfast in the executive lounge not much choice food wasn t that warm slow turnover Eat breakfast in the main restaurant yes it s busier but much better
Positive_Review: Great hotel stayed on many occasions Fantastic bar great rooms modern clean feel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No comments on this one as everything was perfect
Positive_Review: Absolutely helpful and very friendly staff from the reception area to restaurant Spotless rooms and perfect location Made our stay very enjoyable bearing in mind it was both our birthdays An amazing experience like we haven t had in a while The building is very beautiful and the sky lounge is stunning But Definitely the staff adds up to an already magical stay Thanks for everything

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: Having an iMac in the room was nice as we were able to check our emails and watch our YouTube playlists as well as having access to the regular tv channels

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: check in and check out far too slow
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel in an excellent location Bed really comfortable great night sleep Breakfast excellent huge choice and great for kids

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were spacious and comfortable staff were attentive and the breakfast was amazing Couldn t fault it everything was great Location was good too as 2 min walk from the tube station

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room was far too hot and the air conditioning wasn t very good We upgraded to a queen room but couldnt tell much difference from the standard room
Positive_Review: Love the location and the roof top bat

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was awful Very poor quality and limited selection for the money The size of the restaurant is far too small for the volume of guests resulting in very long queues and waiting time just to get in When you do get a table you are practically sat on your neighbours lap By all means stay here but book room only and eat at one of the many quality restaurants in the vicinity
Positive_Review: Nice warm cookie on check in was an unexpected treat

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Like a lot of London hotels now seems to be geared more towards lone business travellers than couples families Only small niggles such as volume on the computer TV didn t work not bath etc Everything was very compact no sense of space
Positive_Review: The room was very clean staff were very polite and helpful and the breakfast was excellent Hotel is in an excellent location right by the tube

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Despite the security provided by card key access to guest floors via the lift elevator a person with intent can easily piggy back a ride or use accessible staircases Not good bearing in mind the recent tragic events in London
Positive_Review: The pro activeness of staff in their immediate recognition that Saturday morning breakfast was becoming really busy and opened a second breakfast facility without hesitation

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Check out took a wile Someone and used our room number to pay for their drinks on the rooftop bar and we has to stand was ages with the receptionist checked threw all the recipts to make sure we hadnt signed it Its ridiculous that someone can even get away with doing that bar staff should be more careful Also they hold money on your bank card even tho i was paying cash and it can take 15 days to go back into your bank account
Positive_Review: The roof top bar during the day when it was quiter less potentious people durying the day Large comfy beds Free cookies Very close to tube station

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Ideally placed hotel to visit Tower Bridge and the Tower of London Lots of restaurants around Our room didn t have the view but up on 12th floor in the bar the views were brilliant A lovely hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Smoking on the roof top bar there should be a non smoking zone for those who do not wish to smoke
Positive_Review: Very conscientious staff and even an iMac in your room to help you plan your trip Hotel is located 1 minute walk away from Tower Hill tube station so easily accessible

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The location was absolutely perfect for what we needed however for a tourist there to see the sights I would not recommend it Brilliant if you are on a Business trip Just beware that on weekends the area surrounding it is extremely quiet and some shops are not open at all It is very close to the tube station however it is a bit of a trek if heading to Oxford Street Leicester Square as the tube line it is on does not go there directly
Positive_Review: We loved the free cookies on arrival The rooms are very modern minimal and clean It was less than 5 minutes walk from Tower Hill train station and the Tower of London The staff were very friendly and accommodating The hotel had a lovely swanky feel to it and the views from the Skylounge were lovely

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I didn t like the 12 5 service charge When I buy two royal mojitos costing 26 and then have to pay 12 5 on top of that is just scandalous I don t like tipping and not because I m tight it s just that I believe you should pay your staff a fair amount and not make them work harder for tips to make their wages better Just my opinion
Positive_Review: I loved the views from the sky bar It made our stay that little bit more special as it was romantic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel great location beside the underground Love the warm cookie on arrival as we were hungry breakfast was ok My partner had a fry which he said wasn t great I had the porridge which was terrible But loved the fresh fruit and pastries The bar on level 12 is beautiful with great views but didn t enjoy it as it took us 25mins to get a drink and it was not that busy We had to watch the barmen show off for an unnecessarily long period of time while they made cocktails Would not go back to the bar again as a result of this

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Would have preferred more of a wine selection in the Executive Lounge Maybe some rose Also no ice machine on 9th floor
Positive_Review: Ideal for me as get train to Fenchurch Street station Not far from underground so easy to get anywhere

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room was very small for the price and it was very warm to warm to sleep
Positive_Review: We were allowed access to our room early We had complimentary drinks due to a request not being carried out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Only downside was bag misplaced for a few moments due to being separated from other luggage and view from hotel looked out to a scaffolding where buildings outside could see right into room
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy and staff was really professional Amazing views from sky bar well worth price of room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent service as we were upgraded to the executive room Got free access to the executive lounge and breakfast The staff on reception made the stay exceptional for my partners 30th

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was an extensive amount of breakfast items available however the staff didn t appear to be able to keep up with the demand on the hot breakfast buffet This meant that we had to wait 10 minutes to get any eggs to go with our English Breakfast by which time the rest of the items were cold
Positive_Review: Check in and check out process and the general customer service experience was great They clearly train their staff to a very high standard

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The sky lounge nice views but definitely overpriced poor cocktails
Positive_Review: friendly and helpful staff clean and comfortable rooms and definitely the location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: Breakfast was amazing The widest selection of food I have ever come across in a hotel and of the best quality too The rooms were so clean it was like everything was brand new and had never been used The location was perfect

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Allergens not listed on items available at the breakfast buffet so unless I asked someone which isn t easy at a busy breakfast I couldn t eat all of the food
Positive_Review: Good clean facilities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The bar staff in the sky lounge are rude no thank yous no eye contact threw my change on the counter payed for a late check out only too be woken up at 9am by maids banging doors in the corridor When I asked the lady too stop banging doors she looked at me didn t apologise and walked straight into another room For the price we paid for this hotel the service was very poor and will not be staying in another double tree Hilton again and will be sure too pass on this info too friends and family
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Not really anything to complain about perhaps the operation off the room card security on the lifts could be more intuitive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Good location excellent breakfast and friendly staff husbands birthday and were given a free upgrade and drinks voucher Would definitely recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Large rooms for London and breakfast was great so better to get it included Easy transport underground nearby Quieter area near London Bridge Walking to Shard and the Walkie Talkie Some shops near by

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Sky lounge view was lovely The breakfast was 10 out of 10 thanks to the front line staffs that go the extra mile for us to make it possible for i and my families because we all vegetarians

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Not enough staff on to deal with checks in and check outs Also soon afterwards my credit card was compromised after its last use at the hotel
Positive_Review: location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Would be great if the hotel offered a spa as well
Positive_Review: The roof top bar was a great experience and all the staff were very friendly would have no hesitation in coming back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The elevators are VERY slow and two of the four were inoperable during our stay There were very long queues to get to the rooms Prices seemed high for the quality of the room
Positive_Review: 12 th floor lounge is nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room was too small bathroom even smaller Room service menu was poor and didn t have what we wanted available Apple TV was small too quiet and hard to use
Positive_Review: The hotel will hold your bags for you if you have a later train home than checkout

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It wasn t worth spending more and upgrading the room essentially the room was no better than premier inn and only a shower very business trip rather than romantic break I questioned whether we had been booked into the right room We d previously stayed in a standard room which was bigger and better
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff good room service options

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lift system was very confusing to begin with
Positive_Review: The relaxed way you can get breakfast without queuing at the restaurant we had bacon rolls and coffee out by reception in comfy chairs

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The Lifts Oh goodness The lifts were a nightmare 2 out of 4 were working It was an absolute pig to go up and down In the end took the escape stairs only to find out you need a key card to get out of the stairwell Met people in the stairwell who couldn t get out Eventually piggy backed a staff member and got out through the kitchen Advised a manager who was mortified Not the best experience Oh and if there s a Party going on in the Sky Lounge a warning would be good as we had planned for a quiet cocktail after a long evening only to be greeted by loud music and drunken women Gave up
Positive_Review: The staff were professional and friendly They behaved like a team Henk checked us in and he had excellent customer service skills Well done Henk

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: had a very small room which is not what I was expecting due to the cost of the hotel
Positive_Review: The breakfast is never good in that hotel and only stay there due to the location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 2 out of 4 lifts out of order for 2 days long queues to use lifts No signage for stairs As in business area many shops restaurants bars shut all day Saturday Sunday
Positive_Review: Nice hotel excellent Sky bar Good location for sightseeing Tower Bridge Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 2 out of the 4 lifts were broken and we were waiting up to 20 minutes on a lift that wasn t packed full
Positive_Review: The welcome service was excellent Upon arrival we were greeted with a choice of soft drinks and a cookie Overall 11 10 for cleanliness

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Elevators needed to be repaired maintenanced a lot quicker due to high level volume of people at hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel is located just minutes from the Tower of London and Tower Bridge which can also be seen from the 12th floor Sky Bar It is a nice clean and comfortable property Rooms are decent sizes and very comfortable The Reception Manager Charis Athanasopoulos was such a pleasure He was so helpful and patient with all of our transportation and tour questions Very knowledgeable about London and the surrounding area Would definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lifts There were 4 lifts but only ever 2 working and always spent ages waiting for it to stop at our floor floor 7 it seemed to skip us all the time so ended up travelling on every floor just to get in it The key cards were very temperamental which was a pain as you need these for the lift to work
Positive_Review: Perfect location only a 3 minute walk to Tower Hill underground Hotel was very clean and rooms to a good standard plenty of shops bars and restaurants close by Sky lounge has amazing views but rather pricey but then that could be as we are from Cornwall and not used to the prices 2 drinks set me back 25

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There were 4 elevators in the hotel but still you had to wait a very long time And many times the elevator was too crowded so you had to wait for the next one It would also work better if the hotel would have a separate elevator to the skylounge for non hotel guests
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is perfect Near the DLR and Underground station but not on the noisy side of the street The room was quite big and clean Nice bathroom Each day you get one complimentary bottle of water per person The skylounge is very nice with a very nice view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 50 of the lifts were faulty which ultimately lead to long delays waiting to access them Since we were on the 7th floor this was less than ideal
Positive_Review: The Staff were really friendly and helpful The location is ideal for accessing London quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We paid for a queen room and ended up with a room no bigger than a double room We expected a little more from the room for the price We didn t receive a very good welcome from staff upon check in
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a perfect location the sky lounge bar is amazing overlooking the Tower of London and tower bridge whilst enjoying a cocktail is what London is all about

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The breakfast was cold 2 lifts out of order Being on the second floor meant that the lift was always full by the time it reached us Stairs not clearly sign posted and not the best to carry heavy cases down Not an issue if your happy to wait 20 30 mins for space in a lift or in no hurry
Positive_Review: The cookie on arrival was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The tea milk and toiletries were not replenished for our second night stay very disappointing Corner of bedroom floor had not been hoovered properly there were Remenants from the previous guests 2 lifts out of order on a busy weekend was not good waited an age for a lift only to find it was full several times over
Positive_Review: Pillows

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The Lifts 2 were out of order which led to massive queues constantly the bedroom card to gain level access was useless led to many frustrating moments which did spoil the stay
Positive_Review: Breakfast fantastic selection of choices all well displayed and replenished quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No staircase for guests to use when 2 out of the 4 lifts weren t working We waited for 20 minutes before we could get in one and even then we had to go up before we could go to the ground floor
Positive_Review: Very welcoming on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There are only 4 lifts which is fine but each day 2 3 of them were out of service which meant a que at the lifts at each of the floors
Positive_Review: Location is super rooms lovely staff are extremely helpful breakfast was very tasty too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The employees manning the front desk on the day I checked in Feb 17 could learn customer service skills from the restaurant staff I waited an hour and 15 minutes before a staff member asked me what I was waiting for hint I had a suitcase Then I was given a room I did not reserve I got a full size bed not the queen size bed As I waited IN FRONT OF THE RESERVATION DESK a staff member had cookies and bottled water to guests waiting to be checked in EXCEPT FOR ME I got the glare stare
Positive_Review: The breakfast was DELICIOUS There was something for EVERY TASTE The hostesses were polite and if something wasn t right they made sure to correct it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There were only two lifts working through out our stay Very long waits which was really annoying
Positive_Review: Loved the hotel and the sky bar what views just amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Did not like them adding service charges to drinks as the drink was very expensive The lifts were out of order and it was an absolute nightmare with so many people in the hotel Bar staff on skylounge were very unsociable and bar was manic at times At arrival we were advised a 25 per night deposit was being taken but would be refunded back to our bank if everything was fine Never have I experienced this in a hotel
Positive_Review: Hotel in a great location clean and spacious

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The wait for the lifts was ridiculous Lots of people were complaining about this In the end we used the stairs as we wasted 15 minutes the day before just trying to get from the 4th floor to the City Cafe
Positive_Review: Location staff room Sky lounge in particular

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Warm cookie on arrival Very helpful staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lifts were very slow in coming some out of order and if on lower floors to full to enter
Positive_Review: The hotel was great great location easy accessible public transport

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing could be better
Positive_Review: Lovely breakfast Restaurant clean Excellent staff The sky bar is well worth a visit better than any bar in London the views are so good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lifts are very slow and the key system caused confusion and only 2 of the four lifts were working which slowed the whole process

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We did not like the lifts You always need to use the card before pressing the button Lift were always full so people should be squeezing to get the card inserted Lift were stopping in each floor so to get to or from 8 floor you should spend 10 minutes in the hot and airless lift

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I was dissapointed the lifts didnt work properly all weekend and we had to wait in a massive line each time we wished to leave the room or travel to the room we where on the 8th floor and ended up carrying all our cases down the stairs when leaving the hotel after waiting for a lift for over 15 minutes Reported this to the staff at checkout and she wasnt very helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fabulous hotel Spotlessly clean Great location Only a short bus ride to the west end Very quiet Very friendly and helpful staff Excellent buffet breakfast It was a delight to stay in made extra special by the little extras Great views from Sky bar at night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Car park is very small 30 places so book in advance Noisey air con even when turned off Hotel room overlooked a scruffy building site but weren t in room much

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
