Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent The staff were great The roof top terrace bar was a great feature too if a little expensive Amazing views and wonderful cocktails try the Lavender Fields Forever at 12 My friend enjoyed a coffee with Baileys again at 12 The bill for the two with added vat etc was 27 Okay for the views we thought and did it all again the following night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Well when you book a Queen Room you expect a queen bed which is bigger than a double but a double is all we got Breakfast per person a bit expensive and a little too expensive for a bottle of beer in the Rooftop Bar although it was very nice bit SKY HIGH PRICES IN A SKY HIGH BAR don t get me wrong I loved the hotel but a little too expensive for little things I had a good stay and would love to stay again
Positive_Review: Great Rooftop Bar friendly staff and a lovely hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The kettle in the room Very cheap quality did not boil properly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: there was building work taking place immediately next to our room It started about 9 a m and finished about 5 p m

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast very poor impossible to obtain a full English as trays always empty very slow to replenish No instructions in rooms regard air conditioning or TVs asked but no response from staff Would not accept debit card if you want to place items on room account Hotel needs to look at the small items which make your stay more enjoyable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: You could have informed me at the booking stage that the privately owned or run kitchen would be closed for restaurant type meals Having to leave the hotel to eat well Queuing half way down the hall to even get into the breakfast room and offered a seat in a draughty entrance hall Bath towels not changed for the Saturday night
Positive_Review: I liked the fact that on the Saturday morning after waiting over 30 minutes the poached eggs were eventually served But they were not as hot as they could have been Oh and I also liked the fact that the pleasant girls serving eventually found some cornflakes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff attentive but could smile more Without wishing to offend some staff could and should have a better command of English as often we were asked to repeat ourselves or couldn t hear understand what was being said in reply

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Great location Sky bar was very nice and great service too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The long que to check in breakfast time got very busy and the scrambled egg was like goo The bed was ok but the quilt was flat and just kept waking me up from trying to move it around to get comfy I woke up every couple of hours

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We booked room service that didn t show rooms are relatively small and get cluttered really quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Dirty marks on duvet cover towels and dirty tissues left near lifts Huge Building site outside

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room is not as large as expected but it was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: that I had to go home
Positive_Review: Hot chocolate cookie on arrival when I returned after a lovely night out they gave me another 2 yummy The Sky Garden Bar amazing great breakfast wonderful service cant wait to come back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: This hotel was amazing starting from the very warm welcome at the reception desk offering chockolate cookies for the arriving guests We celebrated my boyfriend s birthday they completed my request by providing cookies in the room with a nice postcard Since one of our family member got sick they provided extra blanket for free of charge furthermore we got extra as hotel flipflops The breakfast was amazing they provided excellent hospitality and unforgettable nice and delicious food in the morning We also ordered a hot soup in the late evening it was not a problem for us they serviced a good hot soup for the sick family member The music the the dining room was very nice as well The bathroom was super clean and the bed was comfortable for us since it was not soft for our body We could set properly the room temperature as well As for the location it was in a good place as well close to the underground I would like to thank you for everybody for your kindness and attention you provided during our stay you did a great job well done and thank you

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: would have preferred the right to choose the room I have booked rather than it being allocated which so often are the least attractive rooms in the hotel location wise as our room was looking out onto block of accommodation short distance away
Positive_Review: skybar on the roof of the hotel general layout of the hotel and the bedroom

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It was very hot and air conditioner was very noisy so we had to switch it off at night but remained too hot and state air
Positive_Review: Great location nice facilities exciting Apple screen good wifi Also thanks for lovely warm cookies on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We ordered a room with city views and got a wall view The 22 GBP buffet full English breakfast in the morning was cold and replenished sparingly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Thought some of the staff were very helpful but overall checking in was slow and too many people arriving with not enough staff on duty at reception desk Found a slight language problem telephoning the hotel re a request before my stay Their English was not up to standard as they could not understand my simple request

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Very comfortable room and great facilities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The robes in the bathroom were dirty The bathroom smelt like drains at various times of the day We didn t use robes so didn t complain at the time
Positive_Review: The room was fine location was fantastic for sight seeing I had a birthday package and they gave us vouchers for the sky lounge which is amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Some of the staff were difficult to understand when we upgraded they told us it would only be 80 for 2 nights however when we looked at the invoice later we had got charged double 160 so assumed it was 80 pp instead of per room which we weren t happy about As we felt like we had been misled It wasn t until we checked out that the staff who served us noticed and gave us a refund And then we got told as part of the upgrade that there would be free alcohol drinks in the executive room 7 11 pm however when we got there there was only soft drinks we asked at reception and they said it was only half 5 half 8 so we were also misinformed about this too so felt like we had missed out on some of the upgrade benefits
Positive_Review: The location and view were fab we upgraded to an executive room and had a really good view of the tower bridge also breakfast included which was nice and access to the executive room where you got complementary snacks and drinks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Unbelievably my husband arrived before me and was unable to check in as the booking was in my name He gave them my mobile number and they still did not want to let him check in even when he offered to pay again so they could reimburse later as he needed to get ready for our night out and I would only be going to the hotel much later He had to call a a manager Very unimpressed as never had this problem at other hotels Then 9am there was knocking on the door only for staff to use their key for entry We we re only staying the one night so no need for staff to be entering the room Won t stay again
Positive_Review: Great location and bed was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We ate in the Natural Kitchen restaurant which was attached to the hotel We had our meal which was good paid with cash and as we are from Edinburgh we paid with Bank Of Scotland notes This his were the problem started the waitress looked at the notes and said please wait I ll check if we accepted these notes very annoying We then spoke to the hotel receptionist who was shocked and apologised
Positive_Review: Hotel staff were friendly and professional

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Can t think of anything we didn t like
Positive_Review: The disabled parking space was reserved for us as requested The accessible room was comfortable with tea coffee making facilities Wet room facilities were good Great breakfast and very good service in the cafe All staff in the Hotel were helpful and courteous Tower of London on the doorstep What s not to like

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Having to queue for breakfast for 20 minutes every day for 3 days Asking about a peanut allergy and being told best avoid the bread wall Really vague and unhelpful No policy in place All the food you wanted was not there not replenished quickly enough Bread cornflakes scrambled eggs orange juice bacon butter glasses and bowls Sink chipped they should note it in the room as when I mentioned it to reception later that evening they questioned a delay in reporting it I shouldn t have to report it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff at reception were surly and cold I am a Hilton Honours member and received absolutely nothing by way of upgrade I specifically booked this hotel for the car park and was told that it was full and there was no point checking later as people were not going to move their cars and that was that breakfast was horrendous with a queue to get in the meal was lukewarm and very average I always stay at Hilton Hotels when I can but definitely not this one

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The value for money was poor I had very high expectations as I have stayed in a good few places I booked this hotel cause of its name the review and the price this hotel was just over a 1000 pounds for 3 nights and the dicount that they were giving I thought I was in for a treat as I have never payed this amount before so yes my expectations were high to relise I was in a box room with no bath and basic it s the most I have ever payed and the smallest room I have ever had and had to ask for a room with a bath the next time I stay went for breakfast there was no bread no juice no mushrooms there was something every morning so for 30 pounds every morning for breakfast yes I was hoping for more like I said the staff were great they seemed to be apologising a hundred times to peoplr they can only do there best but this was not peak time so I can just imagine how that would of turned out
Positive_Review: The train station was right there so not far to walk staff friendly clean had tea coffee facilities hairdryer iron bath robes drinking water room service kept toping up the goods we used definitely good for business people not for romantic get away

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Restaurant was closed for duration of stay Breakfast spot acted as fill in but very amateur service Not the best Not best location for solo female traveller

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Negative_Review: shower screen off the rail draw broken in room layout bad 1 small window and dark over looking well nothing I have found this hotel has gone down hill in the last few years I have stayed a number of times and always get double charged so have started to pay by cash the room booked was 450 per night and after staying in other hotel found this to be very poor for value the room had 1 small window and very dark found the sky lounge staff could do with being more attentive and listen to its customers concerns and not just brush them off
Positive_Review: Location excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It was not made clear that you had to book to go up to the sky Lounge Bar for midnight on 31st which was one of the reasons we booked A large area of the Sky Lounge is outside
Positive_Review: Very good location close to Tower Hill tube and great views from Sky Lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I paid for executive and that s not what I got checked in at 2 o clock when into the executive lounge and all there stood was a big jar of nuts to eat all afternoon until 6 o clock all they brought out was two plates of chicken wings and some bread and canap s nothing at all for children and very limited alcohol cheap white wine and red wine and beer not what I expected on new years Eve at the hilton I should of got a standard room for half the price
Positive_Review: Rooms was clean beds was comfortable nice looking smart modern hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Apple TV Too small and volume too low
Positive_Review: Lovely bed and bathroom very lively staff on arrival and a hot cookie is always nice My daughter was so happy and excited to see the tree Overall a great stay would come back again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: TV computer did not work could not get any channels all said they were not available Asked for a liqueur coffee one evening was told they couldn t make me one
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Value for money 319 for a room witch when I booked said included breakfast when getting there they said it did not then tried to charge 21 50 per person also the whole point we went was for the roof top bar for new year witch they closed the outside at 11 55 giving us no reason why and also meant they was far to many people in the bar you couldn t move or see anything out the windows with myself being pregnant I was very concerned as people where pushing and banging into me very disappointed
Positive_Review: The location was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Rooms were very very cold even with the heating on restaurant closed at 9 30 and no food except cheese selection from room service rooftop bar closed at 1 30 on New Year s Eve
Positive_Review: Good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lifts were quite slow to arrive and awkward to use as card did not always work Executive lounge use was part of the deal but over subscribed and very busy
Positive_Review: New Year s Eve stay so was very busy staff still had time to deal with enquirys New refurbished room was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Could have done with two comfortable chairs to sit in around the table
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the shower was fantastic The cleanliness was superb

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We booked deluxe rooms but didn t get the extras listed on their website for deluxe rooms
Positive_Review: Hotel was good very very busy but it was new year Staff efficient polite

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: They advertise a cookie on arrival the start of many extras however we were not offered a cookie This year I had decided to pay more for an executive king with lounge access however I was disappointed The room description mentions a coffee machine but there wasn t one and breakfast in the executive lounge was very limited so we went to the main dining room Fresh milk in the room fridge would be nice rather than the little plastic pots of long life
Positive_Review: The staff are friendly and helpful We asked for a different type of pillow and we received them within 5 minutes The bed was so comfortable and breakfast was delicious The location of the hotel was great for getting to and from new year firework display

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We booked this room as it was our First new years eve together and we wanted something special We were so very dissapointed that we were told we had to queue to get into the sky scraper bar for 12 midnight to see in new year we ended up spending it sitting outside the hotel in a bench Very dissapointed when we were told that anyone could go into the skyscraper bar not just hotel guests never Again very expensive and felt we should have been advised when checking in about rooftop bar limited numbers We could of then made other arrangements for 12 to see in the new year
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The rooms were really disappointing we booked a suite and got a normal room with double bed the suites are normal size rooms with a big television the hotel advised there would be I pod docks there was none and top of the range toiletries wich also none very overpriced for what you get would never stay in the double tree Hilton again would use other hotels And would not recommend to anyone very dissapointing
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel enjoys an excellent location just a few minutes walk from Tower Hill tube station The Tower of London Tower Bridge and Borough Market are all just a short walk away

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Hotel does not have dining facility e g breakfast to handle the number of rooms guests at the hotel So if staying at the hotel and having breakfast there then expect 30 60 min wait to get into to the breakfast room I complained about this to the the staff and they openly confirmed that they did not have big enough dining facility and guest should expect a long wait So something the hotel are aware of and not trying to correct So the business model of this hotel is to sell rooms but not provide required facilities for dining There are many hotels in same area with lower or same price range so no point of staying at this hotel Room were ok but naked and with little wardrobe facility
Positive_Review: OK location but there are so many other hotels in the area so no point of staying at this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: On arrival our assigned room smelled of smoke It took 45 minutes two phonecalls and a trip to reception to get moved to another room The staff were not good at communicating what they were doing to resolve this nor did anyone ask us after we moved if everything was then satisfactory
Positive_Review: Location to tower hill tube station was very convenient Breakfast had a wide variety of foods and even though it was very busy they were constantly being monitored and replenished by staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was disorganised and we had to queue every morning Building works going on beside hotel which backed on to our room and the noisy early in the morning Unpleasant smell in the corridors
Positive_Review: location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Initial swipe of payment card was not cancelled after payment was taken at checkout This meant my bank account was short by 428 and I had to spend over an hour in the bank sorting it out
Positive_Review: Good overall service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: TV volume wasn t loud enough even at Max volume Waiting times to check in Room space
Positive_Review: Good quality shower and bathroom Excellent view from Sky lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Food ran out at breakfast What was left was cold and inedible Long queue for breakfast Very poor service in SkyLounge Long wait for check out
Positive_Review: View from Skylounge Check in very welcoming

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Some employees at the reception desk are cold and rude Some minor stains are visible on the quilt and on the bed sheet
Positive_Review: Location is ok 17 mins to Victoria 30 mins to St pancras and 30 mins to canary wharf The service is rapid with quality most of the employees are polite and helpful Fast check in and check out

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Buffet breakfast was only reasonable plenty of choice but plates were cold and buffet breakfast was lukewarm
Positive_Review: Location security efficiency of staff comfort of room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The pillows on the bed were to soft to what I usually prefer there wasn t much selection on alcohol in the executive lounge I don t drink beer or wine and that was all there was to offer the room was lovely but it seemed a bit average for the money I paid for There was no view from the room but there was nothing anyone could do about that because of the area
Positive_Review: I loved the overall hotel the area the staff breakfast and the executive lounge the views from certain point in the hotel and the staff were very helpful and friendly and there was a personal touch to check in with a cookie the rooms were clean and the rooms also included a big tv and a mini fridge I enjoyed the heating controls also It was a special surprise for my partner which made a massive change to where we normally stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff members were all very helpful and the room itself was excellent I have previously stayed at the Westminster Doubletree by Hilton and was not disappointed by this one It is also very close to some decent restaurants and the Tower Hill tube station is less than 5 minutes away

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The only criticism is if I was being very picky was the 9 for 2 small bottles of water as we retired to our room This is a rip off but did not spoil our stay
Positive_Review: An excellent hotel with very friendly staff an ideal location and fantastic roof top bar Wonderful breakfast with friendly helpful staff who were way better than the average found in London hotels

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bed sheet was dirty Tea stains over bathroom floor Mentioned the above on check out and the staff didn t seem that interested despite claiming that if we re not we re not happy they ll make it right Our previous visits have been much better but we ll be looking for somewhere else for our next trip to London
Positive_Review: Good location Cookie on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The fact I went for breakfast at 10 15am and after I d had some cereal there were no sausages or fried eggs Waited for 15 minutes to see if more would be brought out Then when they weren t at 10 40 I asked someone and was told that the kitchen was closed and that I could have a fried egg and sausages but it would take 15 minutes to produce Ridiculous and not what I d expect from a hotel such as this
Positive_Review: Rooms very clean and tidy Beds very comfortable The skylounge is a must for a drink

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Just oneed thing really we d ordered the express breakfast as we were leaving early but it wasn t ready for us and we had to go without it
Positive_Review: Great location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Receptionist was efficient but unfriendly Lifts were awful couldn t get them to accept our card and that s after we realised we needed to use it Notice not obvious enough especially to foreigners Where were the stairs which we would have preferred to use Everything at breakfast seemed to run out and we didn t expect to queue at a Hilton We couldn t switch air con off but it didn t stop us sleeping
Positive_Review: Bed very comfortable Room spacious and practical TV computer very good A safe was provided plus hairdryer Heating very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There wasn t much to fault I would say the only thing that wasn t for me was the feather pillows but I could of changed them if needed so not really a major issue
Positive_Review: The roof top bar is in a perfect location to look out onto londons best sites the staff at the Hilton and the breakfast was spectacular I recommend this highly especial for young couples We will definitely be returning

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The rooms and lodging floors were clean and functional nothing to complain about but much too Spartan They were almost dorm like in their appearance This brought down my overall perception of the hotel
Positive_Review: The vestibule lobby and public areas were first rate The staff was excellent and made the experience at the hotel worth the value I paid for the added breakfast and it did not disappoint At 15 lbs per person it wasn t cheap but it was a good value and worth the price I was glad my wife and I got down for breakfast early because the line that had formed by the time we finished our breakfast was very long I was only in London for a day because of problems at Heathrow However the location of the hotel is right near the Tower Bridge and allowed me a chance to salvage something out of a miserable experience by allowing me to take in a few sights in my limited time

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There are not enough elevators for such a large hotel prepare to wait for a free elevator Compared to the Angel Islington Doubletree the room seemed smaller but for London standards it s still a good size
Positive_Review: Good location next to Tower Hill Station frequent service into central London Easy access from London City Airport to Tower Gateway Station by DLR Sky Lounge bar is a must visit Friendly staff and good breakfast Fair price

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 21 50 for breakfast is way overpriced no parking available even after other guests checked out didn t have us on list for breakfast so had to stand there while they checked embarrassing Was told on checkout room price had increased after I had paid so had to stand there and argue the fact with reception more embarrassment in total cost over 430 for 4 people for 1 night
Positive_Review: Sky lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Poor wi fi connection in room and not much better in lobby There were a lot of very noisy young children who were running around first floor lobby unchecked for a lot of Sunday afternoon
Positive_Review: Reception and concierge team excellent We were looking after a tiered wedding cake delivered ahead of our arrival with their prior agreement They helped us look after it and deliver it safely to the wedding reception venue

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lack of standard in room amenities like shower cap toothbrush vanity set slippers etc etc Not value for money
Positive_Review: The staff Is extremely friendly and service is excellent Check in and check out was smooth and speedy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The location was a bit out if the way for us as we spent most if the time in theatre district and oxford street Also don t get mixed up with the other double tree as we did We booked and stayed at tower bridge double tree but initially arrived at London Bridge double tree We had quite a trek with a suitcase after the staff advised we could walk to the tower bridge hotel
Positive_Review: Comfy bed warm room Didn t really use the facilities of the hotel as we were out and about all the time and back late to hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was the usual scrum at these big hotels serving buffets Tea was weak and tasteless Coffee poor A stressful experience poor and expensive at a whopping 21 Nowhere near as good as you would have at home
Positive_Review: The cookies on arrival are a nice touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The check in service was extremely slow and despite having requested foam pillows in advance the pillows in the room were still feather which I am allergic to It took hours to get them replaced and I had to queue again at check in to remind them
Positive_Review: The room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Day before arrival we had the option of cancelling booking and I asked via email rather than cancel and rebooking Could I switch to new offer I saw which included breakfast After an email trail between hotel and booking com It didn t happen and I finished up paying for breakfast on top of cost which was disappointing albeit it was a lovely breakfast but I left feeling cheated
Positive_Review: View from 12th floor sky lounge was amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The bed was really comfortable and the room was very spacious
Positive_Review: A larger bottle of shampoo conditioner and shower gel would be good only really enough for 1 shower each

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Expensive breakfast we didn t take We carried electric adapter with us otherwise impossible to charge mobile phone No electric outlet in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Central location close to Tower and City of London Nice welcome wich warm chocolate cookie at 2 h in the night Clean Tee and coffee facilities in the room nice and necessary I Mac system computer TV nice Helpful staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room especially walls were filthy I informed stuff about that but they did nothing I expected more from Hilton Hotel Price was too high for standard like this I do not recommend
Positive_Review: Good localization and varied breakfast English and continental

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The breakfast waiting staff My wife allowed her tea to go cold so asked for a replacement using English Breakfast tea The girl brought her EB tea but decaffeinated so further request for standard EB tea Girl then had to go away for 5 mins to find some EB isn t unusual surely Organisation of breakfast buffet was sensible but crockery was hidden away where it wasn t easy to see Toasting machine far away from hot buffet BUT no plates by toaster Cereal dishes were only at the far end of the cereal area so half of the diners approached from the wrong end and couldn t see them
Positive_Review: View from the Sky Lounge seeing Tower Bridge the Shard brilliantly Wonderful outside area too with even better views Hotel is about 300 metres from Tower Hill Underground station Couldn t be better

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The cost of the parking GBP30 p day Main restaurant on Ground Floor stop serving food at 10pm and for central London this should be a bit later we obviously had an experience of arriving slightly after 10pm and missing out
Positive_Review: Bed comfortable restaurants and bar were good cafe staff friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We ordered a cooked breakfast one morning and it took over an hour to arrive luckily we weren t in a rush and when it did arrive the food wasn t that great it definitely wasn t worth the money
Positive_Review: The location was really convenient the hotel itself and the rooftop bar was beautiful and I ve never seen a view like it The hotel was always clean and the bed so comfy The cookie and complimentary drink on arrival was also a lovely touch Loved it would stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing It was perfect for what we needed
Positive_Review: The hotel was exceptionally clean and felt very modern and inviting The reception area is lovely The breakfast was absolutely delicious and the service was impeccable from the moment we arrived Warm cookies on check in was a lovely touch as well

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff treated people very differently dependent on look Told us we hadn t paid for breakfast when we had And couldn t find our baggage after checking it in
Positive_Review: Breakfast was lovely proximity from underground station

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We were charged 620 by mistake as a deposit for incidental damage and was told 50 would be taken Could not sleep as there was a strange clicking sound coming from the hall in our room of a night which sounded like a key being inserted into the door Staff did not seem to know what they were doing
Positive_Review: Breakfast was lovely and in a perfect location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lifts Having to use the room key was hit and miss at best And it wasn t brilliant when you didn t need the room key
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy Hotel was well located for the tube and touristy things

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: o Helpful staff on reception and housekeeping o Bedroom was clean and comfortable o No noisy road traffic o Iron and ironing board in wardrobe o Good ensuite facilities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The bath robe caused my wife to have a serious allergic reaction and she spent a very rough night wondering if she would need to go to A E for treatment The customer care line could only advise me that I could get a taxi to the local hospital in 5 10 minutes if I needed to and didn t seem to be interested otherwise
Positive_Review: The room was standard had everything needed nice bathroom

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: for a medium to high price range I would not expect for the sinks to be broken the double bed to be two singles zipped togeater aswell as the douvet that s not to say it was not good quaility just expected better I also guess there was a staff shortage on the roof terrace bar
Positive_Review: Very nice location and staff really helpful and friendly Tower Hill tube a minutes walks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff where not very helpfull We had booked things to do on the night and missed them because they couldn t get us checked in had to wait ages no apologies or nothing to help our wait
Positive_Review: The room was nice comfy and tidy but overall didn t enjoy my stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was chaos at the reception desk at all times It was the worst check in and check out I have ever had at any hotel The staff was friendly and efficient but there was no clear guidance on who to help next so the guest were frustrated The gentleman waiting behind us during check in even got rather nasty about it We avoided the reception whenever possible because of it I suggest someone relook at the efficiency of the current process
Positive_Review: Very clean and staff was very friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything from checking in the receptionist was lovely obliging and we checked in early This was very helpful as we have travelled a long way Thankyou to all the reception staff Checking out was equally good Our stay was amazing thankyou to everyone at Double Tree Hilton Tower Bridge for all your help and support

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The prices of the cocktails in the sky lounge 26 for two The queue at breakfast was ridiculous and food not very hot and price of a taxi from the station was 27 50
Positive_Review: The staff were very professional Hotel very nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: To be honest I would have preferred firmer pillows in some hotels Iv stayed there is usually one in the wardrobe I didn t ask though either as it was only 1 nights stay
Positive_Review: The reception area was beautiful Lots of comfy sofas x also the staff waiting on at breakfast are the friendliest we have encountered in London and we ve stayed at quite a few places

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Location I thought I d booked Hyde park hotel through booking com as we wer going to winter wonderland and shopping I didn t realise until I checked booking confirmation on the day Bed was very hard and room was cold even with heating on Ordered food using room service and it was cold and not up to standard it was returned without eating
Positive_Review: Lovely clean hotel and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The hotel wasn t very warm we got an upgrade to an executive room after a disagreement the only difference between the rooms really was a larger television Included with the upgrade was access to the executive lounge where we had breakfast which was not as good as the standard breakfast was nearly cold
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy so we had a really good nights sleep

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The view from the room and the sky lounge bar are brilliant rooms were very comfortable nice big tv and there was a train station 2 minutes walk away that will get you anywhere you need to go in the city

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Although the room was non smoking it had obviously been smoked in as it stunk of stale cigarettes There was a service charge re the sky lounge which I missed when I checked out although only small it annoyed me
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast but pricey The sky lounge is a brilliant place to enjoy the extensive and impressive vista and is lively at the weekends

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Doubletree has to take a bit better care of the maintenance of the rooms In our room the cover cap of the shower valve fell off and the hook for the towels in the bathroom fell off as well And also the carpets are really not clean any longer
Positive_Review: Staff is very friendly and flexible As our room was very smelly another visitor smoked in it some days ago they transferred us without any problems to another room Location is great for the Tower Tower Bridge area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Was surprised to have to queue to get into breakfast The food was cold and not replenished quick enough for demand Such a shame
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel great location Love the SKYLounge on 12th floor Staff very helpful attentative Rooms comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We arrived around 1pm I do realise the rooms are not ready until 3pm and that wasn t a problem but a member of staff who booked us in actuality said without my asking if we would like to wait in the lobby they would make us a priority I took that to mean the room would be a little early so we ordered some drinks and it got to 3pm and I went to the counter to ask if the room was ready and it wasn t I was told it wouldn t be long we waited until 20 minutes past 3 and still we weren t called it was my daughters 21st birthday and I had a meal booked on the other side of London so we had to leave and book our bags in as time was running late for our meal we also had to ring the restaurant to say we would be late as it took 45 minutes to get there I don t know what time the room was ready as I never got the said call I do feel it is unexceptable that a room is not ready at 3pm that I have paid for The room was very basic for the price breakfast was nice but expensive also
Positive_Review: The beds are very comfortable the staff at breakfast time are very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a big let down We were seated quite quickly which was good but the 1st day we arrived around 9am the coffee was cold that was put on the table and food was cold in the buffet also a lot of the food had run out and was not refilled On the 2nd day we arrived near the end of breakfast my thoughts would be that even arriving at that time there would still be food available this was not the case All the hot buffet was gone and luckily enough I had ordered eggs so my husband and I had to share my eggs and use the French stick as that was he only bread left It also took me three attempts to get tea and coffee Not what I would expect for the price we paid and the standard of the hotel Very disappointed
Positive_Review: Loved the bed Pillows and duvet were fantastic We even when and bought our own when we got home

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: sky bar too expensive no draught beer in ground floor bar the hotel didnt really encourage you to stay and drink in the facility
Positive_Review: breakfast hot cookies on arrival sky sports in rooms friendlieness of staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was very good in the city cafe also booking in to the hotel we asked to change the room we had there was no problem at all we will book again at this hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Very small rooms Sky Bar had two parties booked both nights which meant we couldn t get a seat on either night Being charged 12 5 service charge when we had to stand at the bar was ridiculous It s your job to pay the staff not mine
Positive_Review: Location was next door to the tube stop Sky bar had great views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The bun fight to get breakfast The breakfast area was very poorly designed and laid out causing question to get food which had a knock on effect as people then had to cue for tables
Positive_Review: The staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: My parents called and asked for a tray of desserts saying we love you be brought up to me and my fianc s room and it was a beautiful tray with lovely desserts We really enjoyed the thought the staff put into it

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The information was very limited about the hotel what s available bars etc most places give you that information in the rooms The lifts were terrible we were given no information about them upon leaving we had to take the fire exit after waiting 20 minutes we d had enough queuing for breakfast was not very good but when we did get breakfast it was good value for money
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely in a great location very clean comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Not your fault but it s a bit of a pain when the circle district line as often happens is not running
Positive_Review: Despite the hotel being exceptionally busy we still experienced a high level of service from very pleasant staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room service was bad ordered a coffee that was lukewarm then ordered chilly and jacket potato worse my partner had ever eaten half of the music channel on the tv never worked and we paid for late check out and 3 different people knocked our door and 1 lady try to come in our room and the full English breakfast was poor and the toiletries was half full good job we had our own
Positive_Review: The lady on reception on check out was very helpful and the waiter that brought the breakfast to our room was nice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Just at breakfast sauces etc to go with hot food were positioned at the beginning when collecting your hot plate
Positive_Review: Position was ideal for us tube bus taxi river boat Loved it we were literally 2 minutes walk from the Tower of London nicely tucked away Pleasant staff clean and comfy rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Check in time was 3 so we dropped off our bags as we were early had lunch next to the hotel and went back at 3 15 still not ready Staff apologised but didn t seem genuine Had to change rooms as we were given a double room and not a queen room
Positive_Review: The breakfast was the best I ve had in a hotel Scrambled egg to die for Such a wide and good selection of foods to set you up for a day in London Room was clean with all the things you need for a weekend

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No instructions to operate the sound on the tv nearby underground closed
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful rooms clean comfortable excellent choice for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: breakfast queue was unbelievable at times didn t know in advance that there were closures on the local tube network at weekends
Positive_Review: very clean room comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Handles on all drawers and wardrobe in the room were impossible to use Not offering nuts nibbles with cocktails we spent over 50 on champagne and were charged over 2 for an eggcup full of nuts and then they added 12 5 service charge on top of everything Long queues to check out TV very small and complicated to use
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast Comfortable bed Very good location Helpful reception staff Quiet at night

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The English of most members of staff is poor they didn t seem to understand a lot and were unable to answer the simplest of questions No information was given by check in staff no check out times we had to find out where breakfast was for ourselves DO NOT pay for the executive club lounge not worth an additional penny We ve stayed in various hotels worldwide with club access and this one doesn t offer any kind of service or comfort more like a cheap bar than a lounge it only offers a happy hour for two hours with excessively limited alcohol wine or beer tough if you drink neither and food which was rammed to the rafters probably because it s so tiny If you re looking for a luxurious relaxing break DO NOT stay here the revelling in the corridors at 2am and the stream of one night stands leaving the hotel at 7am is enough to put paid to that
Positive_Review: Breakfast staff were helpful despite the vast queue to get in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: That we didn t stay for longer
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfy Lots of room in the actual bedroom good facilities too safe fridge iron kettle the check in was easy check out a little longer but only because computers down so we had to pay by cash

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The tv was too small Bit strange that it was an iMac would rather have a proper TV and then can use my laptop If I require a computer
Positive_Review: The breakfast nice windows more coffee when we asked

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I felt the bedroom was a little plain and bland Just lacked character
Positive_Review: The location and facilities of the hotel were great The views from the rooftop bar were amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We had room service for breakfast the breakfast was left in the room after the cleaner had been in Do I called to have MAKE IT RIGHT work for us at on our return to the hotel They said they would sort it out for us We then went to dinner and returned to our room at 11pm to find the breakfast still in our room the whole room smelt of breakfast I then called again to inform the doubletree team we then had to simply leave the breakfast items outside the room in corridor as we was going to sleep Such a shame because everything else was great Room 262 Darren Scott
Positive_Review: The 12 floor bar was amazing service

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I m only splitting hairs here as loved our stay The towels weren t that fresh
Positive_Review: Great location right next to Tube station Very helpful staff we paid a bit extra for bigger room which was well worth the money 2nd time we ve stayed in Double Tree both excellent Love cookies

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room was dark and dingy we only had two lamps one of the others bulb had gone I could barely see whilst getting ready I had to do my hair and make up with the wardrobe open as there was a light inside of it which was brighter than anything else in the room We weren t very unhappy about this but when we tried to tell a member of staff we were hurried along due to there being a que the room was quite depressing and I was very disappointed The sound on the tv did not work We would have opened the curtains for more light but there were so many other rooms facing us that they would be able to see in to our room We usually stay at double tree hilton hotels and I booked the tower hill hotel due to the fact we had always had such good experiences with them I just felt like we were just another number at this hotel and wish we had of gone for somewhere else now
Positive_Review: The cookies on arrival were good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 1 double queen bed is definitely not suitable for a family as advertised by booking com also the hotel wouldn t allow us all to stay in the room anyway Booking com did organise a complimentary pull up childrens bed for us as no family rooms were available Room service was delicious but language barriers meant we were over charged and had to negotiate 3 visits to our room by the waiter going back and for to his manager to agree that we didnt have to pay for their mistake That was frustrating after a long day with tired children
Positive_Review: Very high standard hotel Free delicious cookies

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were extra friendly the hotel itself was amazing and the breakfast was unreal Planning to go back at Christmas and cancelling our original hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast could be a bit cheaper

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Just a one night stay and very clean and comfortable room service good ground floor bar a nice comfortable contemporary space

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It s in a business area so there wasn t much of a local neighborhood feel to the place
Positive_Review: Modern professional feel adequate staff on duty multiple attractive gathering areas in the lobby assess to restaurants in and close to the hotel The room was small quiet and comfortable Convenient to public transportation business and tourist sites and shopping Deal pricing made this a good value for being in the Tower Hill area of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Rooms and bathrooms are very small according to American standards But clean and functional None of the rooms have a view All windows are covered with a business building right in front There isn t much around this particular neighborhood for tourists although the metro station right next door makes it easy to get around I had an issue and it was addressed and resolved quickly but there was some back and forth about how to satisfy make up for it I didn t like the back and forth But again staff hotel manager and guest services were very kind and friendly and took good care of us
Positive_Review: Management staff and guest services are GREAT Probably one of the best I have ever seen and I ve stayed in many 4 star hotels Open buffet breakfast was satisfying with several good quality food choices Made to order omlets were also a big perk Hotel location is very conveniently next to a metro station Although many tourist sites are 20 30 min away the station being right next door is such a big perk

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: This must as well be a student room or dorm Clean as it is a new building But bare poorly serviced and uninspiring And giving guests chocolate chip cookies at the reception and then asking about it on the feedback form That has to be the biggest hotel joke of the year

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The hotel from the outside and the inside lobby was impressive however don t be fooled as the rooms themselves do not fit with the 4star rating and are clean but average which should be reflected in the price We have stayed in other 4star hotels in central London which are much nicer Marketed as a deluxe queen the room and bathroom were bland with bare white walls and beech coloured furniture and there was no ceiling or wall lighting just table lamps Bed was a normal double with cheap duvet and pillows so don t expect a deluxe queen size The Sky Lounge bar has great views over London but is pricey and when settling your bill the staff assume that you are automatically going to pay the 12 5 service charge even though you haven t been waited on at all Cocktails with service charge are around 13

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Our room was clean and comfortable The location was great right by the Tower London Bridge and Brasserie Blanc where we d booked a meal Breakfast was really great loads of choice and very tasty The Skylounge was relaxing and classy The heating in our room wasn t working but when we told reception they got it fixed quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Very expensive breakfast option
Positive_Review: Extremely friendly staff and a lovely feeling within the hotel Apple Mac in the room for internet radio and TV Free high speed wifi is a good touch too

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price was very high for what it was the rooms were what I would find at a premier Inn unfortunately Although the staff were happy to help it definitely wasn t worth the money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was a 2 min walk from Tower Hill Station Check in was swift staff were friendly Hotel room was basic but comfortable Bathrooms were clean and towels shower gels shampoo conditioner etc provided Sky Bar at the hotel was excellent Nice views from the rooftop

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Upon arrival to the rooftop bar with my girlfriend we were standing waiting for a drink for roughly 25 minutes To add to the sting somebody entered the bar and the staff attempted to serve them immediately after they finished the coctails that took them 25 minues to make I had to actually stop them request to be served myself I will add that the bar was more or less empty whilst this happened Staff non apologetic and rude upon me confronting them The money you pay as well is very steep when you consider the rooms are barely scraping average I assume the pricing is based on their location facilities like the rooftop bar
Positive_Review: Fantastic location a beautiful rooftop bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff were very rude and unhelpful The booking was in my partners name however I had the booking confirmation and also had pre paid on my own card which I also had with me yet I was not allowed to check in Then the reception staff undercharged me and were very rude about this to my partner even though it was their fault not impressed and wouldn t go back
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Sky bar great
Positive_Review: Breakfast menu amazing but dining room too small for size of hotel Disappointed waitress blamed customers attending at same time crammed into dining room like a school dinner expected more comfort considering top price paid

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bigger more luxurious room
Positive_Review: Considering we spent nearly 200 for one night the room was very basic The room was small with a small double bed which wasn t comfortable and the duvet was very thin and not cosy at all

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: On arrival we paid out bill in cash or tried to We found it difficult to pay with SCOTTISH STERLING This had to be verified by three people before finally being accepted If that wasn t bad enough we then ate in the restaurant on a different day and again had difficulties paying with SCOTTISH STERLING I would expect this from s two star hotel in the 1970 s not in a Hilton Hotel in 2016
Positive_Review: The hotel was ok close to underground and plenty taxis available outside hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Tube wasn t running on this particular weekend which made for packed buses but luckily we like walking
Positive_Review: Staff friendly and helpful Good location for seeing London Sky bar with great views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great service Really liked the warm cookie on arrival The room was nice with a very comfy bed Breakfast was great with a huge variety The lounge bar had a stunning view of London Would definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Free cookies The bed was comfy Room clean Shame the room didnt have a good view but we were not there long enough so no biggy Staff friendly Secure parking Taxis outside Ideal location for tower of london

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price of the Sky Lounge bar I understand the standard of the hotel but for a Malibu flavoured liqueur with coke and a corona it s understandable as to why my jaw dropped when I got told it would be 18 00 for the 2 drinks
Positive_Review: FANTASTIC HOTEL Absolutely beautiful amazing breakfast and the staff couldn t have been nicer To top it off getting an I Mac in our room was a definite highlight

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was nothing to fault The only problem we had was the Central and District tube line was closed all weekend so transport needed rethinking
Positive_Review: Our stay was excellent from the reception to checkout made all the better by very friendly staff Our room was much more spacious than we expected a walk in wet room type bathroom with fold down shower seat and grab rails most welcome as my husband is disabled The TV Mac was very useful for planning our excursions and finding out local landmarks The in room kettle and tea and coffee was really welcome as was the inclusion of a fridge to keep items cool a nice touch and most appreciated The check in warm chocolate cookie was a surprise and very tasty although I must confess that as it was warm the melted chocolate on my fingers found its way onto the bedspread I m sorry about that Breakfast was busy but seated very quickly by smiling helpful staff There was a wide section of fruit and cereal along with full English and toast croissants and rolls This full selection of tea coffee and juice was also available The complimentary magazines and newspapers was an added benefit I don t think I can write anything detrimental about our stay we have weekends away at least once a month a and staying here was one of the nicest and most memorable of the last five years We both had a wonderful relaxing time and I wish to thank all the staff we had contact with for that

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The tube was not working over the weekend so it caused us a lot of nuuscence and money using alternative modes of transport
Positive_Review: Vacuity to tube station and attractions

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Due to my nut allergy the biscuits on the tea tray in the room and the cookie all guests are offered at check in were not offered to me However neither was an alternative
Positive_Review: Upgraded to Executive Room This was spotlessly clean as was the entire hotel with good views and very comfortable Access to the Executive Lounge made this very worthwhile with complimentary drinks in the evening and no queueing for breakfast in the morning Breakfast was perfect to set you up for a day touring London and catered for all your needs Had mentioned nut allergy when booking and Hotel took every possible step to ensure it wasn t an issue even with room change from upgrade Hotel was in the perfect part of London to explore the capital

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing It was a perfect weekend
Positive_Review: Friendly welcoming staff at Reception complimentary drinks offered for my husbands 40th birthday in the amazing Sky Lounge Bar with its fantastic views of the city Perfect location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The air con was extremely noisy on it s original setting I fixed that with difficulty The bed although comfortable was unstable as it was on wheels and actually moved when you got up to go the bathroom
Positive_Review: The hotel room was large and the bathroom well appointed Very nice breakfast well cooked poached eggs and lots of fresh fruit and small fresh croissants The rooftop bar was great fun and outstanding Lots of non residents used it as well to add to the fun

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was a leak from the flat room into the lobby hallway but there were fixing it Things happen and it was raining Welcome to London
Positive_Review: The staff at the desk were very friendly and extremely knowledgeable They explained the best places to visit and best way to get there They also warned about the black cabs and their unscrupulous practices Watch out for your cab fairs from the airport to the hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The area for breakfast wasn t really big enough for the size of the hotel big queues each morning although they did move quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: The hotel in general was incredible the minute we walked in we both said wow The view from the Skylounge was breathtaking We also received a free warm cookie on arrival and I received a free orange juice while waiting in the queue to check in as I was waiting a while

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The fact I rang as I was lost and a member of staff said it was right in front of the Gerkin I was not happy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We had to queue for 20 minutes for breakfast They brought us all juices whilst we wait However I have never had to wait for breakfast in a hotel before so they struggled to accommodate for all of their guests at popular times We booked this hotel knowing that the Sky Lounge was part of it It was packed and we could not reserve a hotel beforehand either so we ended up standing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Only one minor point The breakfast pots could have been cleared quicker When returning to our table after eating fresh fruit the dirty pots were still on the table when we bought out cooked breakfast back to the table the same happened again when we returned with out toast
Positive_Review: Great prompt service at the reception on arrival and departure Knowledgeable staff member who recommended a restaurant close to the theatre which we were booked to see that day Good size clean and comfortable modern room Great roof top bar with fantastic views Excellent stay will definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was a mix up with room service breakfast on our last day but I found the hotel staff very quick to offer apologies and do their best to make up for the error
Positive_Review: Service was excellent We discovered shortly after we arrived that my son was allergic to the down in the bedding A call to the front desk resulted in a quick resolution with housekeeping immediately replacing all the bedding The location is excellent as well So close to wonderful sites tourist activities and train and Tube stations that made navigating London a fun part of our stay I would stay at this property again with no hesitation

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The sky lounge was smelling like vomit for all night we couldn t even have a drink for more than 2 minutes The check out was 30 minutes excessive time And we ordered the queen room in the top of the hotel and they gave us the second floor
Positive_Review: I loved the bed and the commodities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 1 I was given incorrect information about opening times for the sky Lounge was told 2am so when me and my partner turned up they closed the terrace within 5 mins of us being there This was a special treat for his 30th birthday and that was the reason I chose this location because the views were phenomenal absolutely pointless as we couldn t even take one picture 2 When I was given the wrong times I was also told that all restaurant were closed but we had access to room service great idea until the bill came up to 76 and the food was microwaved and cold on top of it I wasn t expecting a Michelin star dinner but something half decent I didn t even finish my streak as I got tired of chewing it and it turned so hard it s like I had a ball of plastic in my mouth My chips and steak were cold which is disgusting Finally I asked for the steaks to be medium rare and it couldn t have been further from what I asked for for that anount of money I would expect it to be fresh at least I mentioned this to the person I checked out with and he said thanks I ll pass it on to the kitchen What kind of service is that He couldn t even looked or sounded bothered by it at all It s very upsetting as we didn t feel valued at all 3 I called reception and asked a simple question but the operator ended up laughing at me as if I was asking him something pathetic There was so much sarcasm in his voice and it was simply rude I asked if the sky lounge would be playing any football on the morning we checked out he laughed and said no no no it s not that kind of a bar we most definitely won t be playing the football and he carried on laughing at me I was so shocked from his response and so disapointed that all I could say is ok thank you
Positive_Review: 1 Mickala at reception when we checked in was very friendly and helpful great customer service probably spelt her name wrong so my apologies but I hope you can recognise for a really warm welcome and friendly service she provided us 2 The bed was super comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Cocktails were quite expensive there wasn t a lot of option on the late night menu the scrambled egg at breakfast was awful
Positive_Review: The pillows were amazing the room was very clean cosy view from the rooftop bar was amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Obviously the location means prices are sky high because they can be 14 for a glass of wine for example Also we left our bags while we went out In return 6 20 Friday 19th August 2916 the man on Guest Services was on the phone Fair enough but he didn t acknowledge us or indeed the large queue that was forming behind He totally ignored us all not even getting a passing colleague over to take care of the now huffing and puffing queue As a result the last part of our holiday was incredibly stressful as we had to rush for a train we d budgeted an hours time to catch and were left with 30 Thanks Hilton and thankyou whoever you are useless guest services man
Positive_Review: Great location and very attractive hotel and facilities Be sure to visit the 12th floor bar with great views over the Thames Another nice touch is they give you 5 for the bar if you don t use room service they claim this is for the environment but as we all know it actually saves them a fortune on staff and cleaning PLUS it helps the world as collateral Also if they can t sort out a problem you ll get further vouchers for the bars etc My good side says this is a nice way to keep customers happy my cynical side have you spotted I have one It s tragic says it keeps punters on site where they can keep spending lovely money

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Sofa bed wasn t made up no bedding in the room Sofa bed had crumbs and TV remote in terrible experience at roof top bar service was shocking I never got my meal and my husbands bread was mouldy as we were only in London 1day this was were we chose to eat so I had nothing to eat as we didn t have time to then go anywhere else A couple next to us left and never got their drinks We were not charged and received a few free drink and teddies for the kids They re nearly 7 and 8 so weren t impressed with them There wasn t enough toilet roll in the room when I asked a lady who worked there in the hallway she couldn t understand English It s a lovely hotel and was really happy when we first arrived but wouldn t stay at a hilton again We had a bad experience in Manchester a few yrs ago and said never again but as this was a Doubletree thought it would be better

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: What spoiled our experience slight y was when are room key did not work and we were met with demands for identification and were then marched to a room where a very polite but slightly embarrassed young man had to show us in and obtain I d before we could access are room paid for in advance with are poccessions belongings and money We did complain it was more to do with who was managing the reception rather than the staff who were all very courteous overall We were given tickets for drinks as an apology I understand security is needed however it was quite embarrassing at the time As we considered the key not working was not our fault however was instructed we had left the key to close to our mobile devices But don t want this to turn in to a complaint as we enjoyed are stay great location and very clean rooms Overall the staff were very kind

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Check in took about 30 mins because the hilton hadn t allocated rooms for the wedding party 5 booked total I paid fir the rooms in full 1600 and a security deposit 300 not mentioned beforehand btw 1 week after check out I noticed 1900 leave my account I called my bank thinking it could be fraud after the honeymoon period They claimed it was the hilton with pre authorisation I called the hilton who claimed that itnis standard protocol to charge 1900 on the day and then preauthorise an additional 1900 7 days later they held onto this for a further 7 days The hilton claimed it would take 7 10 days to return to my acocunt due to barclays making an error which barckays refused entirely I have not had my security deposit returned to me at this stage i stayed 9th to 11th july I will never book with this hotel chain again Additionally mini bar was empty When i requested it was filled it fell in deaf ears The breakfast was busy and had a que to get into the restaurant Overall I found the whole wedding experience was ruined because of the hotel They simply don t care and fail to understand that taking money such a large sum can have real life impact on a person
Positive_Review: Rooms

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
