Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: On arrival the member of staff tried to continuously sell us extras Breakfast is way too overpriced when there s a Wetherspoons around the corner which does it got 4 59 I didn t have the hotel breakfast There always seemed to be a queue for the breakfast too Sky Lounge prices were extortionate 27 for two drinks
Positive_Review: Warm cookie on arrival yummy Atrium smelt really nice Really clean and tidy Great views from the rooftop bar Very quiet didn t hear a thing from our room on the 6th floor

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We arrived around 10 30 on the Saturday morning and did the check in At the time of booking I requested quiet adjoining rooms we were travelling with my father in law The check in person booked us in 2 adjoining rooms We spent the day in London and only came back around 21 30 When we got to our rooms they weren l side by side at all 650 and 669 We were so tired that we decided not to ask to change room and leave things as they were Then at around 22 00 we started to hear very loud music We were in a supposedly quiet room on the inside of the hotel with a view on the Atrium and not on the street I called guest services once explaining the situation I was told that it probably was one of the neighboors I told her that it was loud and echoing and I was wondering if maybe it came from the cafe on the 12th floor we were on the 6th The person not particularly nice told me that she was going to check She called 5 minutes later to tell me that there was a private party in the cafe on the 12th floor and that they would ask them to be a little quieter It was indeed quieter for about 5 minutes than started again really loud I called again and another person told me that in about 10 minutes it would quieten down it was about 10 20 then We went to bed but didn t fall asleep before midnight as the music carried on loudly until that time I mentionned this to the person who did our check out the next morning and basically she said that if we want a quieter room we shouldn t take a room on the upper floors I feel like the staff didn t really care about that noise business I would also like to add that I am an Hilton Honors member but that booking was made using Bookings com so they didn t know We came to stay here in December as Honors members and they were al lot nicer then This is not normal they shouldn t be nicer to some guests and not others
Positive_Review: Very nice breakfast nice location and brand new hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Guest lift badly explained with a faded sign that was hard to read select floor THEN insert room card into an unmarked slot Room AC out of order off switch did not work
Positive_Review: Very polite and efficient staff and good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Price of the breakfast whichwe did not have and the price for a bottle of Peroni in the skylounge bar is way over priced

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We arrived at our room to find a Z bed made up this had not been requested there was only 2 of us also the room was not big enough for a Z bed it restricted access to the window wardrobe and other facilities This was removed when we asked I had requested a quiet room yet we were put in a room just below the Sky Lounge you could hear the constant opening and closing of sliding doors and moving furniture as you can imagine this went on well into the night We paid for access to the executive lounge yet on 2 occasions on a 3 night stay we were unable to use the facilities 1st time the lounge was closed for floor maintenance and the 2nd time the Coffee machine was out of order and the cleaner was vacuuming surly this could have been done when the lounge closed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: To be honest it is pretending to be posh when its just a glorified premier inn Very expensive in the bar Go to Wetherspoons for a drink and save
Positive_Review: Location is good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Smoking area outside front entrance Not great walking through on way out
Positive_Review: The executive lounge was a plus relaxed atmosphere not stuffy Views were great from our floor 10 and from sky lounge Our hotel of choice for when we are staying in London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Slow check in check out You don t get Hilton points if you book via Booking com
Positive_Review: Great hotel in an excellent location Sky Bar worth a visit as is the ground floor bars

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Took ages to get checked in TV in room had no sound and despite a call to the care line in the 15 hrs I was there no one came to sort it Light bulbs but working in the standard lamp For 169 a night I d expect these basics to be checked and if not at least followed up quickly
Positive_Review: Very quiet despite being a busy hotel and central location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Tv was on mute and as it was an Apple could not find out how to turn sound back on
Positive_Review: Bed great as were the pillows Great to be able to turn air con off and open a window at night for fresh air

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: It was great staying Staff room condition everything was good Hotel was located just 3 min away from subway station and also close to tower bridge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The TV in the room is terrible nothing to watch and app does not work on Mac Also Room Service got every order wrong and had to return up to 3 times sometimes to get it right Due to construction all over the area we could not find the hotel as all the roads leading to it were closed And scrambled eggs at breakfast are horrible
Positive_Review: Free Executive Lounge with certain room types with free tapas wine coffee and drinks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Every staff member from check into check out was excellent except one miserable and rude waitress in the sky bar
Positive_Review: Brilliant location we turned up early and staff were very accomodating and helpful The sky bar is incredible for views but a little pricey even for london

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The a c would not shut down in our room it was complicated and time consuming to get moved The hotel I think would have already known about the problem but I suspect hope that many people just put up with it Breakfast was only OK not the usual standard from Hilton I would say
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Would have preferred a bath but shower was great
Positive_Review: Incredibly helpful staff at all levels first class breakfast service with a smile decent size rooms for London and stunning rooftop lounge bar Amazing hotel

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: warm cookies on arrival was a really pleasant treat The room was clean the bed very comfy the roof top bar was spectacular breakfast was really nice although very busy the staff managed to keep control and seat everyone reasonably quickly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: TV picture quality Could not believe that having such great big TVs in centre of London that there was no HD channels so picture quality really poor Had been watching US Masters in evening and wasn t good to view
Positive_Review: The room had a fantastic view bed really comfy and overall layout of room very good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Our TV turned itself off and we struggled to get it on it was too hi tech for its own good
Positive_Review: Really enjoyed this hotel and will stay again for sure great access to everywhere

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Honestly for the price we paid on a weekday this was a great location and exceptional value We did suggest that they could consider putting mats down in the showers as my partner and I both nearly slipped and we are still relatively young and agile That such a small thing stood out really just highlights the fact that everything else about the design of the room and the experience overall was really impressive
Positive_Review: The hotel is well equipped The computer air con and fridge in the most basic room on site restaurant and rooftop bar were particular pluses This really added value The location is great and for the price we just thought why travel further to central London when we don t need to We had concerns about noise but there was no such issue whatsoever What really stood out for us was the incredible service from the staff The service from Hilton was just exceptional throughout From a request for my partner s birthday before arrival to the warm greeting at check in to the cleaners greeting us in the corridors and even a chance exchange with a chef in the elevator Every single person we encountered in the employ of the hotel was so motivated attentive and warm I think this really reflects on the individuals and also the training and priorities of the company We were so impressed and will definitely consider Doubletree and Hilton for future stays

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The sky lounge was very exspensive I guess you can t really argue with it though because it s London but 19 98 for 2 drinks is steep Unless your filthy rich
Positive_Review: The location was great Very close to a tube station which was a bonus The breakfast was incredible and 100 worth the money Beds were very comfy and the rooms were clean staff were helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Shower head not fitted properly so water sprayed everywhere Not the Hotel s fault but had trouble finding the car park entrance because of all the roadworks going on around the hotel
Positive_Review: Apple iMac in room which doubled up as TV Free wifi Sky Lounge with views over city fabulous

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Front desk services not as good as they could be our room was not ready and we were told we would receive a text message or phone call when it was ready this never happened Also on check out the printer would not work so they offered to e mail the receipt to us this has still not been received safety catch on bedroom door broken bedside clock not working correctly alarm kept going off in the middle of the night and key card was hit and miss as to whether it would work the lift all little things but they add up
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good on the first day but cold on second

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I did not like the first room I was given it had a nasty stain on the carpet it was closely overlooked by windows from the building opposite and the air conditioning was very noisy
Positive_Review: Most of all the attitude of the staff They were without exception friendly and helpful In particular I would like to mention Bea and Yuri as very exceptional

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Unfortunately there wasn t a bath would have loved to have been able to soak my feet after a day of trekking around London But the shower was delightful all the same Noisy air con system didn t need it on during my stay but can t imagine being able to sleep with it on during the summer
Positive_Review: Location was excellent 2 minutes walk from Tower Hill tube station and just across the road from Tower Bridge and the Tower of London Very clean room Great ambience in the hotel and fabulous Skylounge bar Also in a nice quiet area so easy to sleep at night without any disturbance from traffic outside etc Friendly and welcoming staff who were always polite and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No tooth paste brush in the room even though we stayed at executive room
Positive_Review: Good breakfast nice service and friendly staffs A little far away from soho and shopping area but close to many other sightseeing attractions such as tower bridge tower of london and shorditch area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: noisy air con in the room which you couldnt turn off Volume of people at breakfast made it more of a process than an enjoyable experience too many people in one room
Positive_Review: lovely rooftop bar Good service Great location Good breakfast choice and well replenished

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Concierge showed us where we were on the map when we asked for one But give no advice on anything nor did he point out anything of interest nearby We figured it out through the trial and error and got great tips from local tour guides on bus and boat trips that would have been nice to get at the desk on check in And it was quite quiet at the time Otherwise the staff were very helpful
Positive_Review: It s a great hotel Quiet rooms Dark at night Great views Easy access to everywhere in London The Natural Kitchen is amazing Great Brunch and Dinner options The cherry blossom trees outside the glass walls are a lovely touch I proposed after our meal there on Saturday night It was perfect

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Didn t have much of a view we was facing inside didn t have a huge coffee and tea supply in room had to go ask for more
Positive_Review: The breakfast muffins are really nice and the cookie when you check in are really nice the iMacs in the room are a good touch

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Personally I was expecting a king sized bed and it was a double It was also a tiny bit too firm for me although my husband was very comfortable The bedding was up to the usual high standard and as everything else was actually better than perfect and I can be difficult to please I would not let this stop me from staying again
Positive_Review: Check in was great we got an upgrade so we had a free cooked breakfast a wonderful room with a fab view of both Tower Bridge and the Tower of London and the most enormous TV Lots of large fluffy towels already in the room etc The free breakfast was very good the service couldn t have been bettered we were made to feel like VIP s The staff had the most fabulous can do attitude

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Air conditioning heating very noisy so choice of lack of sleep due to room temperature or lack of sleep due to noise
Positive_Review: Clean comfy room with good facilities Exceptionally helpful and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Even switched off the fan air con was quite loud through the night In fairness I didn t ask if anything could be done as I didn t notice until I was already trying to sleep so there could have been an easy fix
Positive_Review: Great location warm cookie on check in was a nice touch Good selection at breakfast Comfortable room with good facilities

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We were told our room wouldn t be ready until 3 30 pm We were offered a superior room which was ready at an extra 60 which we agreed to We didn t think the room was very superior and we were given a 30 reduction on the 60
Positive_Review: staff very helpful hotel and room very clean breakfast good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Our room was quiet small for a queen size compared to other queen size rooms we ve stayed in The shower head was broken which made showering a challenge
Positive_Review: Great location and views from the Sky Lounge

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bar prices were way over the top and booked a queen room which had a view of a run down building from our room which was not pretty
Positive_Review: The location ideal for trains and buses and the staff were very good at making you welcome and helping with your needs

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We paid to be upgraded to an executive room which was clearly not an executive room It was extremely small and only had 1 of each toiletry Air con was extremely noisy and woke us up
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were amazing it was me and my gas first trip together and couldn t have chosen a better hotel We would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No complaints
Positive_Review: Staff were exceptional very polite and helpful Natural Kitchen restaurant which is part of the hotel was terrific Good value excellent service and fine food Roof top Bar expensive but very relaxed and a nice place to finish the evening

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was great however for a vegetarian fairly poor as there was no cooked option as they only had one type of egg scrambled which wasn t too appetising
Positive_Review: The location was excellent within a minute from Tower Hill station The sky lounge was also amazing hosting great views with a range of cocktails maybe a little pricey but worth it for a treat

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The pillows were rubbish they disappear as soon as you touch them Both myself and my husband woke with a stiff neck We told reception who sent up addional pillows which was an improvement Breakfast was hectic and not that great
Positive_Review: The room and bathroom facilities were excellent Very clean The location was perfect for sight seeing and was a 2 minute walk from the tube station Even though it s in the heart of London you couldn t hear any outside noise once in the room

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was possibly the most comfortable bed we have ever slept in in the quietest room An undisturbed sleep is just what you need after touring London all day Sound proofing was perfect as were the views from the rooftop bar as we drank Mojito s Staff were very friendly and keen to please

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location is fab Staff all helpful and friendly Rooms are large and airy We ve stayed many times and will continue to do so The views are also spectacular

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Can t be helped but there are no views from rooms there was a strong drain smell in the bathroom when we arrived gradually diminished
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed stunning view from sky bar polite staff fantastic location for central London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Friendly reception and a lady at the Concierge was extremely helpful in the evening of my check up day She was on high heel but took the effort to bring my 2 luggages down by stairs from 1st floor However there was 1 male staff who was on morning shift at the Concierge on my check out day He did not smile and asked me to bring the luggages up to 1st floor Well it is probably the norm he could have been more helpful The differences in services created different impressions and experiences Thanks

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Shower can get very hot
Positive_Review: Beautiful newly refurbished property Sky lounge views and bar excellent Natural Kitchen for meals next door and warm cookies to die for at check in or in our case each time we came in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Our room was located on 4th floor but the smell from our bathroom was appalling to say the least seriously bad hotel sent cleaner up to spray and put bleach or something in toilet n cleaned shower which masked over smell for about 30mins I actually felt so sick from it They said they d move us to another room but unfortunately they were fully booked
Positive_Review: Location was perfect and views from sky lounge bar were amazing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was a delay in checking in Breakfast was expensive The Skybar didn t serve draught beer
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful the room was comfortable and the hotel is in a good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room not available at check in went back on 2 occasions still not ready Requested a bed in our room for a child in advance I was told this had not been requested I then had to show my booking as proof Bed finally put in the room staff not very helpful did not advise breakfast times where breakfast was held Not a good experience with Hilton have used numerous times in the past always had very good service However not on this occasion which was a real shame as it put a dampener on our weekend
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Pillows too soft Faff with key cards in lift
Positive_Review: Quality and extensive choice at breakfast Friendly helpful staff Excellent location Value for money Quiet Stylish rooftop bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: 1 Long queues at breakfast 2 Big emphasis on organic tea coffee Normal tea please Usual not enough milk At least three sachets reqd for the average cuppa 3 Spent fifteen mins in lift Pressed ground went up then down with others then back up again Getting to ground floor a real problem 4 Ice bucket useless for a bottle of champagne Too small 5 Two safes 6 Apple products computer Just not user friendly 7 Sewing kit and related boxes of nonsense 8 Squirty body lotion went everywhere Bar of soap 9 Hair products shampoo conditioner great if you re thinning upstairs Not enough 10 Square sink renowned for collecting grime Looked grubby after day one I do enough cleaning at home 11 Way to many folding pamphlets of information Counted at least twenty All that was missing was one telling you how to use toilet paper Joke
Positive_Review: What a comfortable well situated well staffed hotel with good sized rooms and excellent cleaning staff Fabulous place to stay but let down by a lift reminiscent of waiting for a bus that won t let you off annoying paraphernalia and organic this and that nonsense which seemed at odds with each other Let s have organic tea while we wonder at the number of trees cut down to produce leaflets of jibber jabber

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bed was not the best but it was only for one night small shower room
Positive_Review: Great in room facilities clean glasses water ice bucket fridge iron safe TV Apple but couldn t get the sound up to actually hear it Friendly staff warm welcome and great location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Honestly have no negative thoughts
Positive_Review: Everything about our trip was great from start to finish booked through booking com and got a fantastic deal Staff were all friendly and helpful Requests I had made were all met and the comfort facilities and breakfast standards were outstanding Thank you for the wonderful stay and I ll be sure to recommend

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Check in was chaotic rooms weren t available even though we explained out tight schedule and requested an earlier check in We were asked to come back at 3pm but at 3 15 our rooms still not available we were once more asked if we could come back later they would phone us when rooms ready After our protests a manager managed to locate another available room this was good but unfortunately it was 3 floors away from the other Bar staff were quite unhelpful rude almost when we asked what beers were available One doesn t expect to have the fridge doors flung open and contents pointed at as a response to a simple question
Positive_Review: Break fast was good the staff were attentive and helpful Friendly efficient staff when we left our luggage for safe keeping on Sunday after check out Hotel has a very good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing everything was great
Positive_Review: Everything about the hotel was spectacular all the staff were really helpful and they offered a lot of great customer service for a four star hotel The bedroom views were excellent and all the facilities were up to standard

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: it was quite expensive in the sky lounge bar but again it is something you would expect from a 4 star hotel and stunning views of London the location seemed brilliant via the tube i did look for food places around tower hill however there wasn t any and we had to walk down to st katherines dock so we had a various choice but limited choice of eating places but other than that a perfect stay
Positive_Review: the staff were extra helpful in our stay Daphne was also exceptionally helpful and would definitely give credits to her helping us with our luxurious stay and helped us with our queries they also arranged for rose petals to be sprinkled on the bed upon request and was absolutely perfect The room was exceptionally quiet and was sound proof to most of the outside it was peaceful and we wasn t disturbed we was completely blown back by the views from the outside balcony bar leading onto the sky lounge bar the views were absolutely beautiful the room was exceptionally clean was such a good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Skylounge prices were astronomical just when we thought we d avoided London prices we got stung in our own hotel
Positive_Review: Very attentive staff no problem too big or small

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room was a little on the small side but to be fair this is evident from photographs so was not a surprise
Positive_Review: Staff friendly Location good Housekeeping services were very impressive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: was more expensive than i thought for 3 rooms after the 25 service charge considering i booked nearly 1 year before but brilliant location would go again try and get a better deal next time excellent staff
Positive_Review: bed was great and comfy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price was at the top of the range for the area and it was not obvious that the hotel was better than the competition
Positive_Review: The hotel met the four star rating and the location was excellent for my needs The staff generally made an effort to be friendly and useful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bed was a bit hard and the lifts were a bit of trouble
Positive_Review: Clean and up to date rooms Hotel catered well to our special requests for our wedding anniversary

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No fridge or tea coffee making facilities in room Tv screen was small was fixed to the desk which was too far from the bed making watching tv difficult Room service too expensive
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy room was nicely laid out Cool decor Liked the Apple TV computer set up Ice machine in hall was good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The breakfast tasted like it had been made ages ago Was a bit dry although when I requested for the eggs to be cooked properly they followed through with my request so made it a bit better
Positive_Review: Everything The bed was so comfortable the Apple Mac system was extra helpful Was able to log in to YouTube and do my workout in the mornings Loved the power of the shower Everything was ace

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Tiny complaint The lifts are temperamental
Positive_Review: The rooms especially the bathroom were very clean very comfy beds and pillows and an excellent breakfast The rooftop bar was great too super London skyline views and a good atmosphere We were there on a Saturday evening

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Be prepared to queue to book in it s such a big hotel and not enough staff to deal with the amount of people booking in If your booking as a package with breakfast don t bother The queue was far too long The breakfast area is very small and isn t big enough for the amount of people staying at the hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel is very close to the tube station The rooms are spacious clean and the bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: My wife cutting herself on a chipped mirror and a chipped glass Breakfast cutlery and coffee being cleared whilst we waited for breakfast buffet All clearly just one of those things and swiftly dealt with
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff seemed to look down on you as if you weren t good enough to stay there the bed sheets had marks on them when we came in looked like blood and the shower was leaking wished I went down the road to a premier inn would have had a better welcome and better room for half the price Also the pictures didn t match up to the room no nice views just others rooms The key cards also stopped working which meant we could get into our room and there was an additional fee of 25 which wasn t mentioned when booking still waiting to get it back
Positive_Review: location was close to the tube and comfy bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The long corridors are awful tasteless and bland The queue for breakfast was dreadful Had we of waited we would of been stood there waiting at least 40 minutes with no apology I ordered some tea around 1am when I got in and asked for some biscuits but got told I can have tea but no biscuits No big deal but it s little things like that which would put me off returning
Positive_Review: Good location nice sky terrace bar though the outside closed at 12 even though the bar was still busy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I had too return 2 cocktails whilst in Sky Bar as the Alcohol was minimal to say the least which was remarkable considering I watched the bar tender make them in front of me he grunted when picked up on it at 12 plus VAT I expect booze in them When checking out the receptionist laughed in disbelief
Positive_Review: Rooms compact but had all what you would need

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We had to queue for about 20 minutes for breakfast the next day definitely don t expect that in a 4 star hotel The breakfast room was a little chaotic too and the service wasn t overly great Not the best Hilton I ve ever stayed at seemed disorganised at times Better places to stay in London for a similar price
Positive_Review: location was awesome breakfast was tasty with lots of choice

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Apple TV was odd to use
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent in terms of quality variety and quantity Midday check out was good Sky sports in room at no extra cost

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: when I booked I had advised that this was my husbands 50th birthday but the room in which was chosen for him was alful we were over looked by the workman we asked to move and that was not much better but we could not be bothered to ask again as we were only staying 1 night all in all I am not sure I would stay again
Positive_Review: Hotel was was clean and tidy but had stayed at the apex hotel 2weeks prior for less cost and was far more superior to the double tree

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price is steep but you get what you pay for The sky lounge was not the place to go for a peaceful drink in the evening
Positive_Review: Fantastic location close to the tube Brilliant breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: It was an area I ve never visited before there was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: Location is most suitable for sight seeing having London Bridge and Tower of London plus boat trips Easy access to tube stations for other locations

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: My husband booked a trip to London for my 30th birthday We had a great time only downside was the location of the hotel there was not a lot of eating places around unless of course you want a pret a manger

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I have to say we were very disappointed with the breakfast served Yes there was a varied choice available more so than other hotels I thought but the bacon was dry and tough the scrambled eggs were very runny and the pancakes were quite rubbery I asked for a pot of tea and I was brought a selection of tea bags and a pot of not boiling water to make my own The breakfast was the only let down of our entire stay
Positive_Review: The pillows were AMAZING I so need to get myself some for home So comfortable The one thing about my trip into London was looking forward to sleeping in the hotel bed The staff were exceptionally accommodating too and nothing was too much trouble

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The room was spic and span as always The breakfast was great a huge variety to choose from with staff always on hand to assist with your questions and queries

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Rooms small a chair and coffee table added to lack of room to move about in the room The lift operation confused so many people Very expensive stay during the week OK if the company is paying
Positive_Review: Location to all you need was excellent Reception staff were very polite and helpful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very expensive the staff could have been more friendly As a young couple we are often wrongly misjudged
Positive_Review: Room was clean and functional had everything you needed and the complimentary water and cookies were lovely

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Cant complain about any think
Positive_Review: The check in lady was fanstactic and lovely help with parking wished we had room on other side of hotel just for the veiw but over all really happy

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room is small if you are from the states We did have one bad staff experience
Positive_Review: Clean hotel On site food is excellent especially Natural Kitchen Over all very helpful staff Customer service team was great

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Maintenance service is very poor 3 nights two changes of room for the same reason air conditioning incredibly noisy What I think is very serious it is that there was no maintenance service from 6 pm on a Saturday in a hotel of 600 rooms
Positive_Review: The staff specially Ana Mar a reception Very attentive and friendly always offering his help to me and my family

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Fabulous hotel Excellent professional but friendly service Wonderful roof top terrace Best breakfast I ve had in a hotel for a long time I loved the relaxed atmosphere at this hotel Will definitely return

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: room size hotel information in the room next to nothing no writig paper orpen airbuble noice from the ventiltion minibar empty tv programs very limited no information about restaurant services available menu etc
Positive_Review: bed exelent brekfast exelent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The lifts were a real headache there s 4 of them but only one seems to work at a time trying to fit every call from each floor in at once left us stopping at the wrong floors nearly every time we got in them regardless of us inserting our key card and selecting our floor correctly
Positive_Review: Room was good and bed was comfy breakfast was great be early to avoid the queue Staff were all very helpful with directions and info Taxis available from right outside as is Tower Hill tube so getting about locally or into the city on foot by train or taxi is a breeze Mainline railways are a 12 15 taxi ride away

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: it would have been a nice touch if the staff had put something in our room for my wife on arrival since it was our anniversary i did mention this at the time of booking but there was no acknowledgement
Positive_Review: we love the location and the skybar this was our 3rd stay as a couple and we chose this again because it was our 20th wedding anniversary

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and views particularly from the Sky Lounge The room was a good size and had everything you need for a short stay Would definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Being told breakfast wasn t in my room rate so didn t have breakfast which I paid for dirty sink in bathroom air conditioning was nosiey last guest food order left in room
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Noise from AC unit when off it had some motor still running so just left it on Trek from Lift to room just saying I m not expecting a new elevator to be built Breakfast was not included and I would not pay the OTT price for a fry or pastries Head out to Pret or all bar one even Wetherspoons if you re really scraping the barrel
Positive_Review: Location stones throw from Tower Hill and on Circle District Line Great access to Tower Bridge and the Tower of London Great choice of food outside with St Katerines Dock close by Sky Bar was nice way to round off the night with a beer and cocktail or two Check out Bodeans near by too US style bbq pit attention at check in manager saw us standing slightly confused in front of a mile wide desk and lots of staff looking very busy Redirected us within seconds of arriving Noise from staff access rooms service rooms was a little off putting we were room opposite so bound to be activity Weekends make the surrounds very quiet which I enjoyed If you want hustle and bustle then a train or two will have you in Oxford street in 20 mins Defo will be back at a good rate with breakie included and a room closer to the lifts above floor 6 for a good view

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very good the service was a little poor Did ask for a city veiw but didn t get one but it didn t spoil are stay
Positive_Review: The hotel was brilliant really enjoy it all

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The service at breakfast could have been a little better I sat with empty cereal bowl and glass for most of breakfast while eating my cooked breakfast
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very welcoming and helpful The atmosphere of the hotel was very friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Drinks a little expensive in the sky lounge but it is London
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel will definitely stay again very clean polite staff easy to find very quiet area

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Great location loved the Cookie on arrival very quirky staff extremely polite helpful Room well equipped with Apple Macs Sky lounge is an added bonus and has lovely cocktails Plenty of variety for breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We were initially cold in the room Took a long time to get warm Television maximum volume was set too low for older people without the sharpest of hearing plus we couldn t hear the TV at all with the central heating on fan
Positive_Review: Loved location public rooms the welcome and the breakfast was perfect Will definitely stay there again We always like to stay in a Hilton by Doubletree where possible

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The light in our room did not work upon arrival The view was quite poor when we booked we did request a city view but instead had the construction of the Four Seasons hotel opposite not ideal to have builders looking into our room from across the street so had to have the curtains closed for the most part They also offer some yummy complimentary cookies however my boyfriend is Vegan and the cookies contain milk eggs so he was unable to enjoy his one
Positive_Review: David was lovely He checked us into the hotel and gave us a nice introduction of what to expect during our stay It was in a very good location to where we had dinner booked that night close to Tower Hill tube station The sky bar was good however perhaps not as high up as some might expect The room was very clean The bed was exceptionally comfortable Lots of amenities in the room Overall a lovely hotel and a comfortable stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The bathroom was a bit cramped
Positive_Review: Breakfast was ok got a table fairly quickly buffet food is never as good as proper food but as I say ok Location was good right in the City easy access to the places I needed to get to to work Nice people on reception

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel was great its best feature is the skylounge with great cocktails and views of London especially the Tower of London The bed by the way was the best we have ever slept in

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Found the design of the executive room slightly odd tv was designed to be low in sound no good if you have hearing difficulties And the position of the bed closest to the wall wss difficult to get round the bed and also too small a space if a guest was on the large side

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The staff gave the impression that they were only interested in getting as many people in and out as quickly as possible rather than taking the time to ensure individual guests needs were met despite the Hilton literature dotted around the hotel promoting the opposite Other than that a pleasant stay
Positive_Review: The room was clean tidy and organised Presentation cleanliness and ambiance of the lobby and groundfloor facilities was very nice We weren t due to check in until 15 00 but our room was ready by 13 30

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Lifts were slow and air conditioning was a bit noisy
Positive_Review: Room very clean we didn t have any food but ended up in the kitchen by mistake and it was very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No TV or background music in the executive lounge leaving for a very somber unenjoyable atmosphere Door handle on the room was Broken and unsecure No meat options in the cooked breakfast selection at the Executive lounge only cooked option was Scrambled egg Not what I expect when paying extra for executive benefits
Positive_Review: Second stay at this hotel fantastic location facility s and staff

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact the speakers on the iMac were so quiet so was difficult to watch TV and we asked for an omelette and it took to long to come
Positive_Review: I loved the way the rooms were laid out and as soon as you enter the lobby you are welcomed It was very cozy and a warm environment

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Bedroom was a little small No view at all I did request high floor with a view But did not get either
Positive_Review: Very good choice at breakfast Nice and bright reception

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: There was a leak in the shower and actually I found the room bland and boring the air con was a saviour but the noise drives me insane and the Mac as a telly is a bit meh
Positive_Review: the location was incredible and the staff amazing Breakfast was pretty good too PANCAKES

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Price felt a bit steep but it was Valentine s weekend Sky bar also expensive I felt
Positive_Review: Checked in at 10am even though it said 3pm on booking held luggage when we checked out friendly and helped us out with tourist advice and travel Free cookies are big bonus and amazing Sky bar has the best views ever

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Concierge need informing on the parking regulations outside of their hotel I was told I would be ok to park my car outside of the hotel until 8am but unfortunately I came to my car before 8am and was issued with a parking ticket Breakfast in the city cafe was very expensive and two light switches in the bedroom were faulty
Positive_Review: Excellent location and cleanliness

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: That I had to leave lol there was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: I have to be honest I loved everything about this hotel from the minute we arrived until we left All the staff were very attentive to any request we had The room was lovely the hotel was very clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Staff We were told during check in that the car park was full The website specifically states parking wouldn t be an issue Yet this was the case and we were asked to park up in the coach carpark a few roads away damper on the day Although late check out was requested and approved for 2pm a staff member decides to knock on the door at 12 30 to ask when we are checking out as there was no record of a late check out on the system Very rude and disappointing We didn t pay near enough 200 for the one night for nothing Poor service We stayed at the MK doubletree the night before where service location was perfect we even received cookies on arrival and price was good
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: A few more milks for tea and coffee in the room
Positive_Review: Great rooms comfy beds lovely shower and super breakfast Warm cookies on check in are fantastic

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Had to change room as there was no view and we had offices overlooking us got changed to another room that wasn t as bad but still had little or no view room was a lot smaller than the review pictures had led me to believe could not eat at hotel as it was way overpriced for breakfast 21 50pp was outrageous and because of this we didn t even consider dinner same as the sky bar just too pricey for the ordinary person plus selection of drink was very limited to poor which meant we only had one drink before leaving even tho we wanted to stay for longer
Positive_Review: The hotels location was very close to tube and The Tower of London the staff were very friendly and helpful the hotel was spotless and clean great view from the sky bar lovely smell upon entry at the lobby the facilities in the room were very good fridge iron hair dryer kettle the iMac was excellent

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Left my bag in luggage area Lucky I checked it before I left as a bag that was placed inside it wasn t there Staff said it must have rolled out in the luggage area I was rather worried and I did think they could have been a litte more apologetic
Positive_Review: Nice staff on checkin Great roof top bar A very quiet room Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The trainee staff knows very little about the Hilton HHonors program I am a gold member and was not offered any upgrade until I had asked I had also prepaid the hotel booking charges but was charged again when I checked upon checked in and refund later I had to suffer from FX losses from this Very disappointed experience I am sure the trainees are doing their best perhaps a supervisor had to be there to assist Thumb down
Positive_Review: Generally good

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The round table was taking too much space Not necessary Also Internet had to be reconnected after every 24 hours If it is free complimentary then keep it running
Positive_Review: Nice neat room Lovely and cozy lobby

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: As a Diamond member they used to provide a free bottle of wine and a small snack which was a nice touch Now they don t In the Exec lounge they don t provide lager as a choice of drink how strange is that it is also very annoying and so I never use the lounge as I cant get the drink I would like
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room floor carpet could have gotten a way better clean up especially around the bed All other areas of the room and bathroom were very clean and nice
Positive_Review: Wonderfull staff felt super welcome also allowed to check in around noon even though listed as 3pm Location is excellent 2min walking from tube line 2 stops away from Liverpool station connecting to all airports Rooftop terrace bar gives you amazing views to downtown Room was comfortably facilitated everything you need 10 karma points for amazing toiletries

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Confusion with room cards in lifts Apple TV limited and screen small
Positive_Review: Room clean comfortable quiet as facing into inner court area Location good Attentive friendly staff Excellent place to stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Room could have been a little bigger but still I would strongly recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: Super friendly staff Good breakfast Good location Good view from top floor bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The room was a bit small and when I tried to extend my stay the price went up ridiculously high so I had to relocate Also I don t like the in room Mac computers which double as TVs The remote control is extremely limited and you have to use the keyboard to for example adjust the volume Everybody has their own computer nowadays so why not just have simple TVs Being offered a free cookie at check in is a bit naff too
Positive_Review: The location was good and the hotel was very smart and clean

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Not much i didnt like only thing i could say is it would have been nice if there was more choice of sandwiches ect on the room service menu after 2am as we got bck late and what was on the menu eg chilli and curry was a little to heavy for that time of night apart from that had a lovely stay of 3 nights

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The comfort control was really noise and buzzed when turned off Incredibly annoying
Positive_Review: Great location and roof top bar with amazing views Clean modern Great breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Stayed for a Saturday night and the hotel s Sky Lounge was very busy Felt out of place wearing casual clothes

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel Fantastic staff Made to feel welcome and nothing was too much trouble Relaxed Loved the view from the Sky Lounge Bar Fantastic stay

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Well equipped rooms good showers Good location

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Really helpful and friendly staff our room was lovely spacious well equipment clean and cosy Our breakfast ticked all the boxes good variety hot delicious food

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: The location was great for our New Years stay to view the fireworks and also to get to the west end easily The whole hotel was very comfortable and we liked the roof top bar which we will visit again in the summer

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very clean Bar on 12th floor nice to relax and very nice view over London Very close to Tower Bridge and the river boats Lots of restaurants and coffee shops Very close to tube We will defiantly use this hotel again when we go back to London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Loved the place but the beds and pillows are so uncomfortable it is a shame Also a lot of noise from the air con system during the night which kept me up again very frustrating
Positive_Review: Atmosphere is great luxury feel to it Location is also great and easy to get to from Liverpool Street

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: At the reception we were asked if we would like to upgrade to an executive room which pushed the peuce up to 300 for the night As it was NYE we decided to treat ourselves we were told with this that we would receive access to the executive lounge and a full breakfast Our new room was on the tenth floor had a view of roofline and nearly the river but not quite For an executive room it was small I dread to think what the size of the queen rooms are We had a moldy muffin left in he fridge of our room which was a lovely welcome The bathroom was nicely fitted out as expected but with a shower door you had to wrestle with to close and wouldn t actually fully close when you did manage to pull it shut We didn t even try to enter the executive lounge as it had been claimed by a group of fouled mouthed individuals who proceeded to swear at anyone who even walked passed them including an elderly couple Their badly behaved children although not as bad as their parents were allowed to run wild until past 1am Please note this hotel does not have a restaurant Upon coming down for our breakfast we found ourselves sat next to part of the same group who destroyed their table and treated the staff appallingly I am surprised a manager did not come to politely tell them to stop desturbing those around them All in all the stay was disappointed For one of the top London hotels I will not be spending that much on a room in the city again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The price its London I didn t expect it to be cheap but what we got for the price we paid was very disappointing we got a queens room which was equal to a standard room at a budget hotel etap ibis
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a nice location as we were visiting central London and was very clean and staff were friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Upgraded room was really not worth the extra money the standard rooms are better
Positive_Review: I love the location and the friendliness of the staff I also like the Skyloung

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Due to us staying for New Years we expected that on the 12th floor at the sky lounge we would be able to see the fireworks but unfortunately we didn t see them due to a building being in the way Also there was no countdown off the dj and it seemed as if he didn t realise it was 12oclock
Positive_Review: Cookie on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Positive_Review: Nice hotel with great views of Shard and Tower Bridge from the Skylon Bar

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Quite expensive 170 for one night and that didn t include breakfast

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Even after paying the charge zone the traffic around the hotel especially on The Embankment was a nightmare so I turned around and went back out 12 for 40 mins for the pleasure of going the 200 yards in and out the zone to from the hotel Lounge bar on top floor had very basic uncomfortable furniture with very loud music and v expensive drinks Forget the ridiculously expensive breakfast and go to the near by Wetherspoons pub only 5 and free refils Also the headline booking rate did not include VAT

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The staff was very pleasant but not that helpful I encountered 3 issues with my stay First my key failed to work 3 times I was told the second time that I could call the front desk from my floor and they would send someone up The 3rd time I took their advice and called I was told by the operator that guest services was too busy to come up at the time Second I borrowed an adapter to use for my stay and was charged 5 for it on my bill I was not informed at guest services that I would be charged for borrowing it Third I do not like to have my room made up during hotel stays so I placed the do not disturb sign on my door I was surprised to find that my room had been made up when I retired for the evening This is a huge invasion of privacy and inexcusable

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We arrived at the hotel at 10 30am and were delighted to be given a room when we hadn t expected to The staff were welcoming and efficient The hotel reception area itself is welcoming and as this was my first visit I was impressed with how luxurious it felt Great location for Borough Market the Tate Globe theatre etc and 2 minutes walk from a tube station It was quiet and the bed was very comfortable The bathroom was immaculately clean with a powerful and hot shower There was a fridge and wine glasses in the room although the Sky Lounge Bar was very inviting for a pre dinner drink Great experience and will definitely stay here on my next visit to London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The Breakfast Buffet It was priced at 15 pound with the voucher The eggs were some type of fake scramble and were stone cold Sausages and Baked beans cold also Hilton DT TH should go visit the Bristol City Centre Marriot to try a good buffet It was only 12 pounds that was an excellent buffet
Positive_Review: I liked the location So easy to get to Tower Hill Station Also liked Counting House Pub within walking distance

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: So disappointed with our stay We were told that we could check in the hotel from 3 00pm we got to the hotel at 3 45pm and our room still wasn t ready We had to wait until 4 30 until we could actually go to our room We then had to wait a further 30 mins for our bags to be bought up to our room We paid for a deluxe queen room and the bed was smaller than our double bed that we have at home So quite clearly we did not have a queen room and I definitely wouldn t describe the room as a DELUXE room We paid 245 to stay here We we re ripped off big time We were told from the hotels website that the more money you pay subject to availability you will stay in a room on a higher floor with a view of Tower Hill Our view was of an open roof tube station We could see people waiting for the train Really nice view Not worth 245 not even close The location was brilliant walking distance to the station and attractions but that doesn t make up for the disappointment from the hotel Absolutely gutted would not stay here again really disappointed
Positive_Review: The sky lounge on the 12th floor had amazing views

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: We visited the sky lounge bar and were asked to take a seat and wait for service 25 mins later with NOservice in sight we left disgusted There were an abundance or staff who obviously had better things to do Let down the hotel and upset us

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were with parents and the location was key Staff were friendly and it was a lovely touch when our waitress in the sky bar asked what we were celebrating and we pointed out it was my parents 60th wedding anniversary and along came four glasses of champagne on the house Very nice feel about the hotel tucked away off busy roads quiet location lovely views although only from the sky bar Bedrooms were comfortable and bathrooms clean We enjoyed our stay and would stay again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The cold water was out the bigger part of the morning making it impossible to shower I decided to have breakfast which took really a long time before the order was taken and the breakfast was served During the evening on the roof top terrace which is excellent btw we were asked around midnight to leave the terrace because they wanted to close Fine not a problem We prepared to leave and took the final sips of our drinks There were still around 50 people on the terrace The so it appeared head of security on the terrace stood 1 metre right next to us and really ushered us off We told him we were on our way maybe he could first tell the other 50 people that the terrace was closing as well He told us we had to leave The way he did that was very aggressive not in a polite manner There was absolutely no need to behave like this We just had 2 drinks there and were going inside In general it appeared that a lot of staff members where either new or very inexperienced
Positive_Review: The roof top terrace is absolutely beautiful

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: The breakfast although plentiful the quality of ingredients was poor for a hotel of this price and status The hot food was cold the bacon was barely cooked and covered in the white gunk of cheap meat sausages were full of gristle and the scrambled eggs resembled rubber

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Booked 2 rooms Allocated a room designed for disabled persons with seat in shower etc and the room had an unusual musty smell Complained and was told I had reserved a room with diabled facilities which I had not as will be seen from my booking com reference Was allocated another room As a colleague was yet to check to his room I asked reception if his room had been allocated and was told it had not I wanted to make sure he was not given the room I had rejected I was disappointed and surprised after the first evening to discover that reception had allocated him the same room I had rejected He was not happy with the room but had been too polite to complain as it was my booking I am not pleased that I was deceived and can t imagine it was a coincidence that he got the same room I had rejected For that reason I would not trust the front desk staff again

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Breakfast was ok a little cold really I visited the bar on two occasions in the same afternoon and purchased the same thing both times and was charged a 12 5 service charge on the second visit I was served to my table which was literally 5 feet away from the bar and expected to pay this on asking for the charge to be removed i was confronted with a barrage of questions why and a bit of an attitude to be honest which did not impress me at all Missing a bath from my room I knew there was a shower only in the room however after a long day walking round London and on and off the underground I would ve just loved a bath to relax and sooth my aching body Also i thought the lack of information in the room on the hotel its facilities restaurant times etc was not good If i needed to know anything such as where the ice machine was situated i had to ask reception

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Wow I travel to the greater London area and London City since 1998 rather frequently Over the years I got used to many run down hotels and staff that could not really care any less This was my first time at this hotel It was more of an accident that I placed reservations here I was most pleasantly surprised Very kind staff at reception and throughout the entire hotel the bath was the most modern and clean bathroom I have seen in London in ages A shower with a water pressure that was surprise not suppressed to a narrow stream This DoubleTree is worth any extra travel time before I sacrifice on service and comfort again and stay at a different hotel I ll be back

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: We love the sky lounge with its panoramic views of London that s why when needing to stay in London with friends we suggested to stay here Unfortunately that evening the sky lounge was full of city workers very drunk so falling over the language we were able to hear was shocking It took us quite a while to find a seat and all of us non smokers realised that those sitting on the terrace were allowed to smoke which kept blowing to our table We moved inside after having enough of this to a quieter spot which was lovely for a while until they all came inside At one point I went to the ladies to find some men in there talking to a lady then they dropped their glass which smashed they laughed and ran out We are no prudes and love a good night out but we were not happy that this behaviour was allowed to happen spoil over people s evenings

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: Queen room very poorly Decoratered view from the room was disappointing The carpet was worn along the corridors and in the bedroom Fire alarm woke us up at 545 am and there was no staff helping or showing people how to evacuate Very disappointed as it was a birthday treat
Positive_Review: Location was good The staff at the skyline bar were very friendly

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: On our last night a letter from reception was pushed under our door asking us to make good the arrears on our account there were none we had prepaid I phoned reception and they said I had taken breakfast which I hadn t They accepted this and said they would sort it out Next day on checking out I found that the imaginary breakfast was still there on our account When we had checked in the receptionist asked if I wished to leave a credit card to cover extras which I declined to do Good job or else the breakfast would have been charged to my account and I may not have noticed I did complain to the front of house manager who apologised and has since emailed with a further apology and explanation of what happened All fine but I would expect such a large organisation to compensate rather than simply apologise in these cases This was our third stay at the Doubletree Tower Bridge and the first time we have had any cause to complain so I wouldn t want to put anyone else off but make sure you double check your bill
Positive_Review: Location appointments of room warm cookie on arrival

Hotel_Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London Tower of London
Negative_Review: room was very small for the price paid weren t very well informed of the facilities we could use by staff and on the last day we tried to get a drink from the sky lounge as we had spare time before our train however we were told it was table service were given a drinks menu after five minutes but ended up waiting 25 minutes and after still no service we had to leave to catch our train Wasn t busy
